anya-e0804n2:4_1: Ettha āvaraṇaṁ nāma pidahanaṁ vā parirundhanaṁ vā palibuddhanaṁ vā harituṁ vā appadānaṁ, sabbametaṁ vaṭṭati. Rundhati, rundhiti, rundhīti, rundheti, avarundheti.
anya-e0804n2:4_2: Kammani – maggo purisena rundhiyati. Rodho, orodho, virodho, paṭivirodho, viruddho, paṭiviruddho, pariruddho. Rundhituṁ, parirundhituṁ. Rundhitvā. Parirundhitvā.
anya-e0804n2:5_1: So hi rundhati pavesitānaṁ kurūrakammantānaṁ sattānaṁ gamanaṁ āvaratīti rodhoti vuccati. Orodhoti rājubbarī,
anya-e0804n2:5_2: sā pana yathākāmacāraṁ carituṁ appadānena orundhiyati avarundhiyatīti orodho. Virodhoti ananukūlatā.
anya-e0804n2:5_3: Paṭivirodhoti punappunaṁ ananukūlatā. Viruddhoti virodhaṁ āpanno.
anya-e0804n2:5_6: Vuttañhi ‘‘yathā arīhi pariruddho, vijjante gamane pathe’’ti. Avaruddhoti pabbājito.
anya-e0804n2:6_0: Muca mocane. Migaṁ bandhanā muñcati. Muñcanaṁ, mocanaṁ. Dukkhappamocanaṁ, moco.
anya-e0804n2:7_0: Mocoti cettha aṭṭhikakadalīrukkho. Muñcituṁ. Muñcitvā. Kārite ‘‘moceti, mocetuṁ, mocetvā’’tiādīni.
anya-e0804n2:8_0: Rica virecane. Riñcati. Riñcanaṁ, virecanaṁ, vireko, virecako. Riñcituṁ. Riñcitvā.
anya-e0804n2:9_0: Sica paggharaṇe. Udakena bhūmiṁ siñcati. Puttaṁ rajje abhisiñci. Abhiseko. Muddhābhisitto khattiyo. Siñca bhikkhu imaṁ nāvaṁ, sittā te lahumessati. Sittaṭṭhānaṁ. Siñcituṁ. Siñcitvā.
anya-e0804n2:10_1: Kammani ‘‘yuñjiyatī’’ti rūpāni. Keci ‘‘yuñjate’’ti icchanti. Yuñjanaṁ, saṁyogo, anuyogo, bhāvanānuyutto, saññogo, saññojanaṁ, atthayojanā. Dīghaṁ santassa yojanaṁ. Yuñjituṁ, anuyuñjituṁ. Anuyuñjitvā. Yojeti.
anya-e0804n2:14_0: Bhuja pālanabyavaharaṇesu. Pālanaṁ rakkhaṇaṁ. Byavaharaṇaṁ ajjhoharaṇaṁ. Bhuñjati, paribhuñjati, saṁbhuñjati. Dāsaparibhogena paribhuñji.
anya-e0804n2:14_1: Kārite ‘‘bhojeti bhojayatī’’tiādīni rūpāni. Bhojanaṁ, sambhogo, mahibhujo, gāmabhojako , upabhogo, paribhogo. Bhutto odano bhavatā. Sace bhutto bhaveyyāhaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:14_2: Odanaṁ bhutto bhuttavā bhuttāvī. Tumantāditte ‘‘bhuñjituṁ, paribhuñjituṁ, bhojetuṁ, bhojayituṁ, bhuñjitvā, bhuñjitvāna, bhuñjiya, bhuñjiyāna, bhojetvā, bhojetvāna, bhojayitvā,
anya-e0804n2:15_0: Tatra bhuñjatīti bhattaṁ bhuñjati, bhojanīyaṁ bhuñjati.
anya-e0804n2:15_1: Tathā hi ‘‘khādanīyaṁ vā bhojanīyaṁ vā khādati vā bhuñjati vā’’tiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:15_2: Apica kadāci khādanīyepi ‘‘bhuñjatī’’ti vohāro dissati. ‘‘Phalāni khuddakappāni,
anya-e0804n2:15_6: Teneva ca paṭisevatīti paribhuñjatīti attho saṁvaṇṇiyati.
anya-e0804n2:15_7: Apica ‘‘kāme bhuñjatī’’ti ca ‘‘pañcakāmaguṇe paribhuñjatī’’ti ca dassanato pana bhuñjanaparibhuñjanasaddā paṭisevanatthena katthaci samānatthāpi hontīti avagantabbā.
anya-e0804n2:15_8: Saṁbhuñjatīti sambhogaṁ karoti, ekato vāsaṁ karotīti attho.
anya-e0804n2:15_9: Ettha siyā ‘‘nanu ca bho atra bhujadhātu pālanabyavaharaṇesu vutto,
anya-e0804n2:15_10: so kathaṁ ettakesupi atthesu vattatī’’ti? Vattateva, anekatthā hi dhātavo,
anya-e0804n2:15_12: Ito paṭṭhāya tumantādīni rūpāni na vakkhāma. Yattha pana viseso dissati, tattha vakkhāma.
anya-e0804n2:17_3: Pāpake akusale dhamme bhindatīti bhikkhu. Tenāha –
anya-e0804n2:18_0: ‘‘Na tena bhikkhu so hoti, yāvatā bhikkhate pare;
anya-e0804n2:19_0: Visaṁ dhammaṁ samādāya, bhikkhu hoti na tāvatā.
anya-e0804n2:22_2: Saṅghaṁ bhindatīti saṅghabhedako. Devadattena saṅgho bhinno,.
anya-e0804n2:22_3: Bhindiyatīti bhinnoti hi nibbacanaṁ. Na te kaṭṭhāni bhinnāni. Bhindatīti bhettā.
anya-e0804n2:23_0: Chidi dvedhākaraṇe. Chindatīti chedako, evaṁ chettā. Kese chettuṁ vaṭṭati. Chindiyatīti chinno.
anya-e0804n2:23_2: Idaṁ pana bhidichididvayaṁ divādigaṇaṁ patvā ‘‘bhijjati chijjatī’’ti suddhakattuvācakaṁ rūpadvayaṁ janeti,
anya-e0804n2:24_0: Tadi hiṁsānādaresu. Tandati. Tandī, taddu. Taddati kacchu.
anya-e0804n2:25_0: Udi pasavakiledanesu. Pasavanaṁ sandanaṁ. Kiledanaṁ tindatā. Undati. Undūro, samuddo.
anya-e0804n2:26_0: Vida lābhe. Vindati. Govindo, vitti. Ettha vittīti anubhavanaṁ, vedanā vā.
anya-e0804n2:27_0: Vida tuṭṭhiyaṁ. Vindati, nibbindati. Nibbindanaṁ. Virajjati. Nibbindo kāmaratiyā. Vitti, vittaṁ, vedo.
anya-e0804n2:28_1: ‘‘Vitti hi maṁ vindati suta disvā’’ti hi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:29_0: Vedaganthe ca ñāṇe ca, somanasse ca vattati;
anya-e0804n2:31_0: Lipa limpane. Limpati, limpako. Avalepo. Avalepoti ahaṅkāro.
anya-e0804n2:32_0: Lupa acchedane. Lumpati. Vilumpako, vilutto vilopo.
anya-e0804n2:34_0: Yadā caññe vilumpanti, so vilutto vilumpatīti.
anya-e0804n2:35_0: Pisa cuṇṇane. Piṁsati. Pisako. Pisuṇā vācā.
anya-e0804n2:35_1: Āgamaṭṭhakathāyaṁ pana ‘‘attano piyabhāvaṁ parassa ca suññabhāvaṁ yāya vācāya bhāsati, sā pisuṇā vācā’’ti vuttaṁ,
anya-e0804n2:37_0: Ahiṁsakoti me nāmaṁ, hiṁsakassa pure sato;
anya-e0804n2:38_0: Ajjāhaṁ saccanāmomhi, na naṁ hiṁsāmi kiñcanaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:40_0: Sumbhapahāre. Yo no gāvova sumbhati. Parisumbhati. Sumbhoti. Atrime pāḷito payogā –
anya-e0804n2:43_0: Datvā ca no pakkamati, bahudukkhaṁ anappaka’’nti ca,
anya-e0804n2:45_1: Tā idha anupapattito na vuttā. Kecettha maññeyyuṁ,
anya-e0804n2:45_2: yathā bhūvādigaṇe ‘‘saki saṅkāyaṁ khaji gativekalle’’tiādīnaṁ dhātūnaṁ paṭiladdhavaggantabhāvassa niggahītāgamassa vasena ‘‘saṅkati khañjatī’’ti rūpāni bhavanti,
anya-e0804n2:45_3: tathā imasmiṁ rudhādigaṇe ‘‘muca mocane kati chedane’’tiādīnaṁ dhātūnaṁ paṭiladdhavaggantabhāvassa niggahītāgamassa vasena ‘‘muñcati kantatī’’tiādīni rūpāni bhavanti.
anya-e0804n2:45_4: Evaṁ sante ko imesaṁ tesañca visesoti?
anya-e0804n2:45_5: Ettha vuccate – ye bhūvādigaṇasmiṁ anekassarā asaṁyogantā ikārantavasena niddiṭṭhā,
anya-e0804n2:45_6: te ākhyātattañca nāmikattañca patvā suddhakattuhetukattuvisayesu ekantato niggahītāgamena nipphannarūpā bhavanti,
anya-e0804n2:45_7: na katthacipi tesaṁ vinā niggahītāgamena rūpappavatti dissati. Taṁ yathā? Saṅkati, saṅkā, khañjati, khañjo iccādi.
anya-e0804n2:45_8: Ayaṁ anekassarānaṁ ikārantavasena niddiṭṭhānaṁ bhūvādigaṇikānaṁ viseso.
anya-e0804n2:46_0: Ye ca rudhādigaṇasmiṁ anekassarā asaṁyogantvā akārantavasena vā ukārantavasena vā niddiṭṭhā,
anya-e0804n2:46_1: te ākhyātattaṁ patvā suddhakattuvisayeyeva ekantato niggahītāgamena nipphannarūpā bhavanti, na hetukattuvisaye.
anya-e0804n2:46_2: Nāmikattaṁ pana sahaniggahītāgamena vinā ca niggahītāgamena nipphannarūpā bhavanti.
anya-e0804n2:46_4: tattha sasaṁyogarūpāyeva bhavanti. Taṁ yathā? Muñcati, muñcāpeti, moceti, mocāpeti. Chindāpeti. Chedeti, chedāpeti. Chindanaṁ, chedo. Muñcanaṁ, mocanaṁ. Kantati, kantanaṁ, sallakatto. Piṭṭhimaṁsāni attano,
anya-e0804n2:46_5: sāmaṁ ukkacca khādasi iccādīni. Tattha ukkaccāti ukkantitvā, chinditvāti attho.
anya-e0804n2:47_0: Nanu ca bho evaṁ sante ākhyātanāmikabhāvaṁ patvā suddhakattuhetukattuvisayesu ekantato paṭiladdhaniggahītāgamehi saki khaji ādīhiyeva rudhādigaṇikehi bhavitabbaṁ, na pana mucachidiādīhīti? Tanna,
anya-e0804n2:47_1: mucachidiādīhiyeva rudhādigaṇikehi bhavitabbaṁ rucadhātuyā samānagatikattā, tathā hi yathā ‘‘rundhissa, rundhayati, rundhāpeti, rundhanaṁ, rodho,
anya-e0804n2:47_2: virodho’’tiādīsu niggahītāgamāniggahītāgamavasena dvippakārāni rūpāni dissanti, tathā mucachidiādīnampīti.
anya-e0804n2:48_0: Nanu kaccāyane niggahītāgamassa niccavidhānatthaṁ ‘‘rudhādito niggahītapubbañcā’’ti lakkhaṇaṁ vuttanti? Saccaṁ,
anya-e0804n2:48_2: Yadi ca nāmikapadattampi sandhāya vuttaṁ bhaveyya,
anya-e0804n2:49_0: Nanu ca bho evaṁ sante sakikhajiādīnaṁ niccaṁ saniggahītāgamakriyāpadattaṁyeva sandhāya ‘‘rudhādito niggahītapubbañcā’’ti idaṁ vuttanti sakkā mantunti? Na sakkā,
anya-e0804n2:49_1: sakikhajiādīnaṁ rudhadhātuyā asamānagatikattā nāmikatte dvippakārassa asambhavato.
anya-e0804n2:49_2: Tathā hi yesaṁ yā nāmikatte niggahītāgamāniggahītāgamavasena dvippakāravantatā,
anya-e0804n2:49_3: sā eva tesaṁ rudhādigaṇabhāvassa lakkhaṇaṁ. Tañca sakikhajiādīnaṁ natthi.
anya-e0804n2:49_4: ‘‘Saṅkā khañjo’’tiādinā hi nāmatte ekoyeva pakāro dissati saniggahītāgamo,
anya-e0804n2:49_6: caṅkamana’’ntiādinā nāmikatte dvippakāravantatāsambhavepi niggahītāgamassa abbhāsavisaye pavattattā sā dvippakāravantatā rudhādigaṇabhāvassa lakkhaṇaṁ na hoti,
anya-e0804n2:49_7: tasmā abbhāsavisaye pavattaṁ niggahītāgamaṁ vajjetvā yā dvippakāravantatā,
anya-e0804n2:49_9: Ayaṁ nayo atīva sukhumo sammā manasi kātabbo.
anya-e0804n2:50_0: Rudhādī ettakā diṭṭhā, dhātavo me yathābalaṁ;
anya-e0804n2:54_0: Divu kīḷāvijigisābyavahārajutithutikantigatisattīsu. Ettha ca kīḷāti laḷanā, vihāro vā.
anya-e0804n2:54_2: Vihāro iriyāpathaparivattanādinā vattanaṁ. Vijigisāti vijayicchā. Byavahāroti vohāro. Jutīti sobhā. Thutīti thomanā. Kantīti kamanīyatā. Gatīti gamanaṁ. Sattīti sāmatthiyaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:54_3: Imesu atthesu divudhātu vattati. Dibbati. Devo. Devī. Devatā.
anya-e0804n2:55_0: Ettha devoti tividhā devā sammutidevā upapattidevā visuddhidevāti.
anya-e0804n2:55_1: Tesu mahāsammatakālato paṭṭhāya lokena ‘‘devā’’ti sammatattā rājarājakumārādayo sammutidevā nāma.
anya-e0804n2:55_2: Devaloke upapannā upapattidevā nāma. Khīṇāsavā visuddhidevā nāma.
anya-e0804n2:55_3: Vuttampi cetaṁ ‘‘sammutidevā nāma rājāno deviyo kumārā.
anya-e0804n2:56_0: Idaṁ panettha nibbacanaṁ – dibbanti kāmaguṇajhānābhiññācittissariyādīhi kīḷanti, tesu vā viharantīti devā.
anya-e0804n2:56_1: Dibbanti yathābhilāsitaṁ visayaṁ appaṭighātena gacchantīti devā.
anya-e0804n2:56_3: Atha vā taṁtaṁbyasananittharaṇatthikehi saraṇaṁ parāyaṇanti devanīyā abhitthavanīyāti devā.
anya-e0804n2:57_0: Ettha ca thutikanti atthā kammasādhanavasena daṭṭhabbā,
anya-e0804n2:58_0: Idaṁ pana yathāvuttesu sammutidevādīsu paccekaṁ nibbacanaṁ – dibbanti kīḷanti attano visaye issariyaṁ karontīti devā, rājāno.
anya-e0804n2:58_7: sakkonti ca ānubhāvasampattiyā taṁtaṁkiccaṁ nipphādetunti devā, cātumahārājikādayo.
anya-e0804n2:58_13: kāmiyanti ca anuttarapuññakkhettatāya daṭṭhuṁ sotuṁ pūjituñca,
anya-e0804n2:58_15: sakkonti ca cittācāraṁ ñatvā te te satte hite niyojetuṁ amatamahānibbānasukhe ca patiṭṭhāpetunti devā, visuddhidevā.
anya-e0804n2:59_3: ‘‘Ahaṁ deva sakalajambudīpe aññassa rañño santike kiñci bhayaṁ na passāmī’’tiādīsu issarapuggale.
anya-e0804n2:59_4: ‘‘Pañcahi kāmaguṇehi samappito samaṅgībhūto paricāreti devo maññe’’tiādīsu upapattideve.
anya-e0804n2:60_0: Devīti rājabhariyāpi devadhītāpi ‘‘devī’’ti vuccati. Devassa bhariyāti hi devī,
anya-e0804n2:60_3: Tathā hi vuttaṁ vimānavatthuaṭṭhakathāyaṁ ‘‘dibbati attano puññiddhiyā kīḷatīti devī’’ti.
anya-e0804n2:61_1: ‘‘Atha kho aññatarā devatā abhikkantāya ruttiyā abhikkantavaṇṇā’’tiādīsu hi devaputto ‘‘devatā’’ti vutto ‘‘devoyeva devatā’’ti katvā,
anya-e0804n2:63_0: Obhāsentī disā sabbā, osadhī viya tārakā’’ti-
anya-e0804n2:66_0: Devo suro ca vibudho, nijjaro amaro maru;
anya-e0804n2:69_0: Khi khaye. Khiyati. Khayo. Khiyanaṁ. Rāgakkhayo.
anya-e0804n2:70_0: Khi nivāse kodhahiṁsāsu ca. Khiyati. Na gacchasi yamakkhayaṁ. Nāgadānena khiyanti.
anya-e0804n2:73_0: Ruca rocane. Rocanaṁ ruci. Bhattaṁ me ruccati. Bhattampitassa na ruccati. Pabbajjā mama ruccati. Ruccituṁ, ruccitvā.
anya-e0804n2:73_1: Keci pana imasmiṁ divādigaṇe ‘‘ruca dittimhī’’ti paṭhanti.
anya-e0804n2:73_2: Taṁ na yuttaṁ katthacipi dittisaṅkhātasobhanatthavācakassa rucadhātuno ‘‘ruccatī’’ti rūpābhāvato. Tasmā evaṁ sallakkhetabbaṁ,
anya-e0804n2:73_3: dittirucīnaṁ vācako rucadhātu bhuvādigaṇiko. Tassa hi ‘‘rocati, virocati.
anya-e0804n2:73_5: Ruciyāyeva vācako pana divādigaṇikopi hoti curādigaṇikopi.
anya-e0804n2:73_6: Tassa hi divādigaṇikakāle ‘‘gamanaṁ mayhaṁ ruccatī’’ti rūpaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:73_7: Curādigaṇikakāle ‘‘kiṁ nu jātiṁ na rocesī’’ti rūpaṁ. Āpubbo ce ācikkhane vattati, ‘‘āroceti,
anya-e0804n2:74_0: Muca mokkhe. Dukkhato muccati. Saddhāya adhimuccati. Mutti, vimutti, adhimutti, muccamāno.
anya-e0804n2:75_0: Uca samavāye. Uccati. Oko, ūkā, ukkā.
anya-e0804n2:77_1: ‘‘Ukkāsu dhāriyamānāsū’’ti hi āgataṭṭhāne dīpikā ‘‘ukkā’’ti vuccati. ‘‘Ukkaṁ bandheyya, ukkaṁ bandhitvā,
anya-e0804n2:77_2: ukkāmukhaṁ ālimpeyyā’’ti āgataṭṭhāne aṅgārakapallaṁ. ‘‘Kammārānaṁ yathā ukkā,
anya-e0804n2:77_3: anto jhāyati no bahī’’ti āgataṭṭhāne kammāruddhanaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:77_4: ‘‘Evaṁ vipāko ukkāpāto bhavissatī’’ti āgataṭṭhāne vātavego ‘‘ukkā’’ti vuccati.
anya-e0804n2:77_5: ‘‘Saṇḍāsena jātarūpaṁ gahetvā ukkāmukhe pakkhipeyyā’’ti āgataṭṭhāne suvaṇṇakārānaṁ mūsā ‘‘ukkā’’ti veditabbā. Iccevaṁ –
anya-e0804n2:81_0: Che chedane. Chiyati, chiyanti. Avacchitaṁ, avacchātaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:82_0: Saja saṅge. Saṅgo laganaṁ. Sajjati. Sajjanaṁ, sajjito, satto.
anya-e0804n2:83_1: kāyakammādīnaṁ sammāpayogavasena avippakiṇṇatāti attho. Yujjati. Yogo, yogī.
anya-e0804n2:86_0: Passāmi vo’ha’mattānaṁ, yathā icchiṁ tathā ahu’’nti
anya-e0804n2:87_0: Vacanato avassaṁ kātuṁ yujjati upapajjatīti yogoti vuccati.
anya-e0804n2:88_0: Ranja rāge. Rajjati. Virajjati. Rajjamāno, rajjaṁ, rajjanto, rāgo, virāgo, rajjanaṁ, virajjanaṁ, rajanīyaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:88_1: Upasaggavasena añño attho bhavati. Samhā raṭṭhā nirajjati,
anya-e0804n2:89_0: Tattha virāgoti virajjanti ettha saṁkilesadhammāti virāgo, nibbānaṁ maggo ca.
anya-e0804n2:90_0: Vijī bhayacalanesu. Vijjati, saṁvijjati. Saṁvego, saṁvejanīyaṁ. Ubbijjati. Ubbego, ubbiggahadayo.
anya-e0804n2:91_0: Lujavināse. Lujjatīti loko. Lopo, lutti, lujjanaṁ, lutto.
anya-e0804n2:92_0: Ṭhā gatinivattiyaṁ. Ṭhāyati. Ṭhāyī, ṭhiti, ṭhānaṁ, ṭhito, tatraṭṭho, tiṭṭhaṁ, kappaṭṭhāyī, āsabhaṭṭhānaṭṭhāyī.
anya-e0804n2:95_0: Pāḷi nidassanaṁ. Lāpaṁ gocaraṭṭhāyinanti ca. Tattha ṭhāyāmīti tiṭṭhāmi.
anya-e0804n2:96_0: Ḍigatiyaṁ. Ḍiyati. Ḍemāno. Ḍino vā. ‘‘Ucce sakuṇa ḍemāna, pattayāna vihaṅgama.
anya-e0804n2:98_0: Tā pālane. Tāyati. Aghassa tātā. So nūna kapaṇo tāto, ciraṁ rujjati assame. Tāṇaṁ, parittaṁ, gottaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:99_0: Tatra parittanti mahātejavantatāya samantato sattānaṁ bhayaṁ upaddavaṁ upasaggañca tāyati rakkhatīti parittaṁ, gaṁ tāyatīti gottaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:100_0: Nata gattavināme. Gattavināmo gattavikkhepo. Naccati. Naccaṁ. Nigaṇṭho nāṭaputto.
anya-e0804n2:101_0: Dā sodhane. Dāyati. Dānaṁ. Anuyogadāpanatthaṁ. Anuyogaṁ datvā. Dānaṁ datvā.
anya-e0804n2:102_0: Dāsupane. Dāyati. Niddāyati. Niddāyanaṁ, niddāyamāno, niddāyanto.
anya-e0804n2:103_0: Dādāne. Puriso dānaṁ dāyati. Āpubbo gahaṇe. Adinnaṁ ādiyati. Sīlaṁ samādiyati.
anya-e0804n2:103_1: Kamme – purisena dānaṁ dīyati, adinnaṁ ādiyati. Kārite – ādapeti, samādapeti, ādapayati, samādapayati, ye dhammamevādapayanti santo.
anya-e0804n2:105_0: Ettha ca parittanti samantato khaṇḍitattā parittaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:105_2: Tasmā parittanti appakassa nāmaṁ kāmāvacarassa ca dhammassa appesakkhattā.
anya-e0804n2:106_0: Dā suddhiyaṁ. Dāyati. Vodāyati. Vodānaṁ. Akammakoyaṁ dhātu.
anya-e0804n2:108_1: Ādīnavotiādīnaṁ dukkhaṁ vāti adhigacchati etenātiādīnavo, doso.
anya-e0804n2:110_0: Bhidi bhijjane. Bhijjanadhammaṁ bhijjati. Bhijjatīti bhinno. Bhijjanaṁ bhedo.
anya-e0804n2:111_0: Chidi chijjane. Suttaṁ chijjati. Chijjatīti chinno. Evaṁ chiddaṁ. Chijjanaṁ chedo.
anya-e0804n2:112_0: Khididīniye. Dīnabhāvo dīniyaṁ, yathā dakkhiyaṁ. Khijjati, khinno, akhinnamati, khedo, khedaṅgato lokahitāya nātho.
anya-e0804n2:113_0: Ettha khedaṅgatoti kāyikadukkhasaṅkhātaṁ parissamaṁ patto, dukkhamanubhavīti attho.
anya-e0804n2:114_0: Pada gatiyaṁ. Pajjati. Maggaṁ paṭipajjati. Paṭipattiṁ paṭipajjati. Addhānamaggappaṭipanno hoti, phalasamāpattiṁ samāpajjati. Āpattiṁ āpajjati. Akammakampi bhavati, tesaṁ adhammo āpajjati, pajjo, byagghapajjo, sampadāyo.
anya-e0804n2:115_1: Byagghapajje saddulapathe jātoti byagghapajjo, evaṁnāmako kulaputto.
anya-e0804n2:115_2: Sampadiyati ñāpiyati dhammo etenāti sampadāyo, akkhātā.
anya-e0804n2:116_0: Vida sattāyaṁ. Sattā vijjamānākāro. Vijjati, saṁvijjati. Jātavedo, vijjā, avijjā, vidito.
anya-e0804n2:117_1: So hi jātova vedayati dhūmajāluṭṭhānena paññāyati, tasmā jātavedoti vuccati.
anya-e0804n2:117_2: Vijjāti dhammānaṁ sabhāvaṁ viditaṁ karotīti vijjā, ñāṇaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:117_3: Avijjāti khandhānaṁ rāsaṭṭhaṁ, āyatanānaṁ āyatanaṭṭhaṁ, dhātūnaṁ suññaṭṭhaṁ, saccānaṁ tathaṭṭhaṁ,
anya-e0804n2:117_5: Dukkhādīnaṁ pīḷanādivasena vuttaṁ catubbidhaṁ atthaṁ aviditaṁ karotīti avijjā, moho.
anya-e0804n2:118_1: Ummādo nāma muyha naṁ vā sativippavāso vā cittavikkhepo vā. Majjati, pamajjati. Matto, surāmadamatto. Matto ahaṁ mahārāja. Puttamaṁsāni khādayiṁ. Mattahatthī, pamatto, ummatto.
anya-e0804n2:119_0: Appamādo amataṁ padaṁ, pamādo maccuno padaṁ;
anya-e0804n2:120_0: Appamattā na miyyanti, ye pamattā yathā matā.
anya-e0804n2:121_0: Mida sinehane. Mejjati. Mettā, metti, mittaṁ, mitto.
anya-e0804n2:122_1: Antarapubbo dhādhātu vijjamānassa vatthuno adassane vattati. Antaradhāyati. Antaradhānaṁ, antaradhāyanto. Sā devatā antarahitā. Antarāpidhāyati.
anya-e0804n2:123_0: Budha avagamane. Avagamanaṁ jānanaṁ. Bujjhati, buddho, buddhi, buddhaṁ, bodho, bodhi. Bujjhitā saccāni. Sakalaṁ buddho, buddhavā, vibodheti, bodhetā, buddho, vibuddho iccādīni.
anya-e0804n2:124_0: Tatra buddhoti bujjhitā saccānīti buddho, bodhetā pajāyāti buddho.
anya-e0804n2:124_1: Atha vā pāramitāparibhāvitāya paññāya sabbampi ñeyyaṁ abujjhīti buddho.
anya-e0804n2:124_2: Keci pana kammenapi buddhasaddassa siddhaṁ icchantā evaṁ nibbacanaṁ karonti ‘‘sammāsambuddho vata so bhagavāti adhigataguṇavisesehi khīṇāsavehi bujjhitabboti buddho’’ti.
anya-e0804n2:124_3: Vitthāro pana niddese vuttanayena gahetabbo. Buddhīti bujjhatīti buddhi. Evaṁ buddhaṁ bodho bodhi ca. Atha vā bujjhanaṁ buddhi. Evaṁ bodho bodhi ca, sabbametaṁ paññāyādhivacanaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:125_1: Bodhīti hi rukkhopi maggopi sabbaññutaññāṇampi nibbānampi evaṁpaṇṇattiko puggalopi vuccati,
anya-e0804n2:125_3: ‘‘antarā ca bodhiṁ antarā ca gaya’’nti ca āgataṭṭhāne rukkho bodhīti vuccati.
anya-e0804n2:125_7: ‘‘Bodhi bhante rājakumāro bhagavato pāde sirasā vandatī’’ti ‘‘ariyasāvako bodhīti vuccatī’’ti ca āgataṭṭhāne evaṁpaṇṇattiko puggalo.
anya-e0804n2:127_0: Rukkhe magge ca nibbāne, ñāṇe sabbaññutāya ca;
anya-e0804n2:130_0: Ettha ca koci payogo tumantādīni ca rūpāni vuccante – ‘‘guyhamatthamasambuddhaṁ, sambodhayati yo naro. Paraṁ sambuddhumarahati. Bujjhituṁ, buddhuṁ, bujjhitvā, bujjhitvāna, bujjhituna, buddhiya, buddhiyāna, buddhā, buddhāna’’ iti bhavanti.
anya-e0804n2:131_1: paresaṁ bodhetuṁ ayuttanti attho. Sambuddhunti saṁbujjhituṁ. Buddhāti bujjhitvā, evaṁ buddhānāti etthāpi.
anya-e0804n2:132_1: ‘‘budhvā bodhitale yamāha sugato’ti ca dhakāravakārasaññogavato padassa dassanato tvāpaccayantabhāvato ca dhakāravakārasaṁyogavasena ‘‘budhvā’’ti padasiddhi icchitabbā’’ti vadanti,
anya-e0804n2:132_2: taṁ tādisassa padarūpassa buddhavacane adassanato ca,
anya-e0804n2:132_5: ‘‘buddhā bodhitale’’ti ca padassa dassanato na gahetabbaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:132_6: Tathā hi na tādiso pāṭho buddhavacanassa anukūlo hotīti.
anya-e0804n2:132_7: Na hi buddhavacane vassasatampi vassasahassampi pariyesantā tādisaṁ vakāradhakārasaññogapadaṁ passissanti.
anya-e0804n2:132_9: Tañhi sakkaṭaganthe kataparicayabhāvena vañcitehi vidūhi icchitaṁ, na saddhammanītividūhi.
anya-e0804n2:133_0: Ko maṁ viddhā nilīyati. Laddhā macco yadicchati.
anya-e0804n2:136_0: Tattha viddhāti vijjhitvā. Laddhāti labhitvā. Laddhānāti labhitvāna. Diṭṭhāti disvā.
anya-e0804n2:136_1: Iti ‘‘viddhā laddhā laddhāna diṭṭhā’’ti padāni tvāpaccayena saddhiṁ gatānipi saññogavasena vakārapaṭibaddhāni na honti,
anya-e0804n2:136_2: tasmā ‘‘buddhā buddhāna’’ iccetānipi ‘‘laddhā laddhāna’’ iccādīni viya parihīnavakārasaññogāni eva gahetabbāni.
anya-e0804n2:136_3: Ye ‘‘budhvā’’ti rūpaṁ icchanti paṭhanti ca, maññe te tvāpaccayo vañceti, tena te vañcanaṁ pāpuṇanti,
anya-e0804n2:136_4: tasmā tādisaṁ rūpaṁ aggahetvā yo saddanītiyaṁ saddavinicchayo vutto,
anya-e0804n2:137_1: Tathā hi bodhanasadduccāraṇena jānanaṁ vikasanaṁ niddakkhayo ca gahito, tasmā ‘‘budha ñāṇe, budha vikasane,
anya-e0804n2:137_2: budha niddakkhaye’’ti vuttaṁ hoti. Bujjhati bhagavā, dhamme bujjhati, pabujjhati, padumaṁ bujjhati. Puriso buddho, pabuddho, bodhati, pabodhati iccādīni.
anya-e0804n2:138_1: Saṁpubbo dhādhātu sandhimhi vattati. Nevassa maddī bhākuṭi, na sandhiyati na rodati.
anya-e0804n2:138_2: Na sandhiyatīti idaṁ aññehi pakaraṇehi asādhāraṇaṁ divādirūpaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:139_0: Dhanu yācane. Mātā hi tava irandhati,
anya-e0804n2:141_0: Yudha sampahāre. Yujjhati. Yodho, yuddhaṁ, caraṇāyudho,
anya-e0804n2:141_1: yakārassa vakārabhāve ‘‘āvudha’’nti rūpaṁ. Tatra caraṇāyudhoti kukkuṭo.
anya-e0804n2:142_0: Kudha kope. Kujjhati. Kodho, kujjhanā, kujjhitattaṁ. Kuddho atthaṁ na jānāti, kuddho dhammaṁ na passati.
anya-e0804n2:143_0: Sudha soceyye. Soceyyaṁ sucibhāvo. Sujjhati. Suddhi, visuddhi, sujjhanaṁ, suddho, visuddho, parisuddho. Kārite ‘‘sodheti, sodhako’’ iccādīni.
anya-e0804n2:145_0: Radha hiṁsāyaṁ. Rajjhati, virajjhati, aparajjhati. Aparādho.
anya-e0804n2:146_0: Rādha sādha saṁsiddhiyaṁ. Rādhayati, sādhayati. Ārādhanaṁ, sādhanaṁ. Saparahitaṁ sādhetīti sādhu, sappuriso.
anya-e0804n2:147_0: Vidha vijjhane. Vijjhati. Paṭivijjhati. Khaṇa viddha, vidhu, vijjhanako, viddho, paṭividdho, vijjhanaṁ, vedho, paṭivedho, vijjhitvā, viddhā, viddhāna. Ko maṁ viddhā nilīyati.
anya-e0804n2:148_0: Idha vuddhiyaṁ. Ijjhati, samijjhati. Iddhi, ijjhanaṁ, samijjhanaṁ, iddho.
anya-e0804n2:148_2: Ijjhanti vā sattā etāya iddhā vuddhā ukkaṁsagatā hontīti iddhi.
anya-e0804n2:149_0: Gidhuabhikaṅkhāyaṁ. Gijjhati, gijjho. Gaddho. Gaddhabādhipubbo. Kāmagiddho na jānāsi. Gedho.
anya-e0804n2:150_0: Rudhi āvaraṇe. Rujjhati, virujjhati, paṭivirujjhati. Virodhako, viruddho. Rodho, virodho, paṭivirodho, anuvirodho.
anya-e0804n2:151_2: Puriso aññassa purisassa kriyaṁ anuvidhīyati tatrāyaṁ pāḷi –
anya-e0804n2:155_1: Anupubbo rudhadhātu icchāyaṁ vattati. Anuruddho, anurodho. Anusmāti kiṁ virodho.
anya-e0804n2:156_0: Tattha anuruddhoti anurujjhati paṇītaṁ paṇītaṁ vatthuṁ kāmetīti anuruddho. Anurodhoti anukūlatā.
anya-e0804n2:156_1: Ayaṁ pāḷi ‘‘so uppannaṁ lābhaṁ anurujjhati, alābhe paṭivirujjhatī’’ti.
anya-e0804n2:157_0: Byadha tāḷane. Byajjhati. Byādho. Byādhoti luddho.
anya-e0804n2:157_1: Taṁ taṁ migaṁ byajjhati tāḷeti hiṁsatīti byādho.
anya-e0804n2:159_0: Mana ñāṇe. Maññati, avamaññati, atimaññati. Seyyādivasena maññatīti māno. ‘‘Maññanā, maññitattaṁ, māno, ahaṅkāro, unnati, ketu, paggaho, avalepo’’ti pariyāyā.
anya-e0804n2:160_0: Janajanane. Sakammakoyaṁ dhātu. ‘‘Jaññatī’’timassa rūpaṁ, karotīti attho.
anya-e0804n2:160_1: Kārite – janesi phussatī mamaṁ. Janayati, sukhaṁ janeti, janayatīti janako, pitā, yo koci vā nibbattetā.
anya-e0804n2:160_3: Tattha ‘‘janeti janayatī’’ti rūpāni curādigaṇaṁ patvā suddhakatturūpāni bhavanti. Karotīti hi tesaṁ attho.
anya-e0804n2:161_0: Janī pātubhāve. Īkārantoyaṁ akammako dhātu, vipubbo ce, sakammako. Putto jāyati, jāto.
anya-e0804n2:161_1: Puthu kilesā jāyanti etthāti puthujjano. Jananaṁ jāti, ‘‘sañjāti, nibbatti, abhinibbatti,
anya-e0804n2:161_2: khandhānaṁ pātubhāvo’’ti pariyāyā. Itthī puttaṁ vijāyati, itthī puttaṁ vijātā.
anya-e0804n2:161_3: So puriso vijātamātuyāpi amanāpo. Upavijaññā itthī. Kārite ‘‘jāpeti, jāpayati. Atthajāpikā paññā’’ti rūpāni.
anya-e0804n2:162_1: Idha hiṁsāvacanena ghaṭṭanaṁ gahetabbaṁ. Saddo sotamhi haññati. Paṭihaññati.
anya-e0804n2:162_2: Buddhassa bhagavato vohāro lokile sote paṭihaññati. Imāni kattupadāni.
anya-e0804n2:162_3: Bhūvādigaṇaṁ pana patvā ‘‘lohena ve haññati jātarūpaṁ,
anya-e0804n2:162_4: na jātarūpena hananti loha’’nti pāḷiyaṁ ‘‘haññatī’’ti padaṁ kammapadaṁ,
anya-e0804n2:162_7: lohaṁ jātarūpena kammārā hanantīti hi attho.
anya-e0804n2:163_1: Ruppanaṁ kuppanaṁ ghaṭṭanaṁ pīḷanaṁ. Ruppati. Rūpaṁ, ruppanaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:163_2: Imassa pana ‘‘rūpa rūpakriyāya’’nti curādigaṇe ṭhitassa ‘‘rūpeti rūpayatī’’ti rūpāni bhavanti.
anya-e0804n2:164_0: Tattha rūpanti kenaṭṭhena rūpaṁ? Ruppanaṭṭhena rūpaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:164_2: Ruppatīti kho bhikkhave tasmā ‘rūpa’nti vuccati. Kena ruppati? Sītenapi ruppati, uṇhenapi ruppati, jighacchāyapi ruppati, pipāsāyapi ruppati,
anya-e0804n2:165_0: Tattha ruppatīti kuppati ghaṭṭiyati pīḷiyati, bhijjatīti attho. Bhijjatīti vikāraṁ āpajjati,
anya-e0804n2:165_2: Ettha ca kuppatīti etena kattuatthe rūpapadasiddhiṁ dasseti,
anya-e0804n2:165_5: so pana kattubhūto kammabhūto ca attho bhijjamāno nāma hotīti imassa atthassa dassanatthaṁ ‘‘bhijjatīti attho’’ti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:166_0: Atha vā ruppatīti rūpanti kammakattutthe rūpapadasiddhi vuttā.
anya-e0804n2:166_2: teneva bhijjatīti atthoti kammakattutthena bhijjatīti saddena atthaṁ dasseti.
anya-e0804n2:166_5: Yadā pana ‘‘ruppatī’’ti padaṁ kattuatthe kammakattuatthe vā,
anya-e0804n2:167_0: Rūpasaddo khandha bhava nimitta paccaya sarīra vaṇṇasaṇṭhānādīsu atthesu vattati.
anya-e0804n2:167_1: Ayañhi ‘‘yaṁ kiñci rūpaṁ atītānāgatapaccuppanna’’nti ettha rūpakkhandhe vattati.
anya-e0804n2:167_4: ‘‘Sarūpā bhikkhave uppajjanti pāpakā akusalā dhammā, no arūpā’’ti ettha paccaye.
anya-e0804n2:167_5: ‘‘Ākāso parivārito rūpantveva saṅkhaṁ gacchatī’’ti ettha sarīre.
anya-e0804n2:167_6: ‘‘Cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe ca uppajjati cakkhuviññāṇa’’nti ettha vaṇṇe.
anya-e0804n2:168_0: Khandhe bhave nimitte ca, sarīre paccayepi ca;
anya-e0804n2:170_0: Kupa kope. Kuppati. Kuppanti vātassapi eritassa. Kopo, pakopo. Vacīpakopaṁ rakkheyya.
anya-e0804n2:177_1: Attanoyeva jaṇṇukaṁ olubbha tiṭṭhati. Lubbhanaṁ, lobho, lubbhitvā, lubbhitvāna, lubbhiya, lubbhiyāna, olubbhitvā, olubbhitvāna, olubbhiya, olubbhiyāna, lubbhituṁ, olubbhituṁ.
anya-e0804n2:178_0: Tattha lobhoti lubbhanti tena sattā, sayaṁ vā lubbhati,
anya-e0804n2:178_2: Ettha pana ‘‘lobho lubbhanā lubbhitattaṁ rāgo taṇhā tasiṇā mucchā ejā vanaṁ vanatho’’ iccādīni lobhassa bahunāmāni veditabbāni.
anya-e0804n2:179_0: Khubha sañcalane. Khubbhati, saṁkhubbhati. Khubbhitthanagaraṁ. Saṅkhobho. Kārite – khobheti, khobhayati.
anya-e0804n2:180_0: Samu upasame. Cittaṁ sammati, upasammati, vūpasammati, samaṇo, santi, santo.
anya-e0804n2:181_0: Ettha samaṇoti sammati santacitto bhavatīti samaṇo.
anya-e0804n2:181_1: Kāritavasena pana kilese sameti upasametīti samaṇoti nibbacanaṁ daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:182_0: Samu khede nirodhe ca. Khedo. Kilamanaṁ. Nirodho abhāvagamanaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:182_1: Addhānamaggappaṭipannassa kāyo sammati. Aggi sammati. Santo.
anya-e0804n2:183_1: ‘‘Ayañca vitakko ayañca vicāro santā honti samitā’’tiādīsu niruddhabhāve.
anya-e0804n2:183_2: ‘‘Adhigato kho myāyaṁ dhammo gambhīro duddaso duranubodho santo paṇīto’’tiādīsu santañāṇagocaratāyaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:183_5: ‘‘Pañcime bhikkhave mahācorā santo saṁvijjamānā’’tiādīsu atthibhāve. Etthetaṁ vuccati –
anya-e0804n2:187_0: Damu damane. Dammati. Danto, damo, damanaṁ. Kārite ‘‘cittaṁ dameti, damayatī’’ti rūpāni.
anya-e0804n2:188_0: Tattha damoti indriyasaṁvarādīnaṁ etaṁ nāmaṁ. ‘‘Saccena danto damasā upeto.
anya-e0804n2:188_1: Vedantagū vusitabrahmacariyo’’ti ettha hi indriyasaṁvaro ‘‘damo’’ti vutto. ‘‘Yadi saccā damā cāgā,
anya-e0804n2:188_2: khantyā bhiyyodha vijjatī’’ti ettha paññā ‘‘damo’’ti vuttā.
anya-e0804n2:188_3: ‘‘Dānena damena saṁyamena saccavajjenā’’ti ettha uposathakammaṁ ‘‘damo’’ti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:191_0: Yā gatipāpuṇesu. Yāyati, yāyanti. Pariyāyo. Yāyamāno mahārājā, addā sīdantare nage. Yāyanto. Yāyantamanuyāyati. Yātānuyāyī. Yāyituṁ, yāyitvā iccādīni.
anya-e0804n2:192_1: pariyāyasaddo vāradesanākāraṇesu samantato gantabbaṭṭhāne ca sadise ca vattati.
anya-e0804n2:192_2: ‘‘Kassa nu kho ānanda ajja pariyāyo bhikkhuniyo ovaditu’’ntiādīsu hi vāre vattati.
anya-e0804n2:192_4: ‘‘Imināpi kho te rājañña pariyāyena evaṁ hotū’’tiādīsu kāraṇe.
anya-e0804n2:196_0: Vilī vilīnabhāve. Sappi vilīyati. Kārite vilāpayati.
anya-e0804n2:198_0: Sivu tantasantāne. Sibbati, saṁsibbati. Sibbaṁ, sibbanto. Kārite – sibbeti, sibbayati, sibbāpeti, sibbāpayati.
anya-e0804n2:202_1: Siyati anavasesato mānaṁ siyati samucchindatīti aggamaggo mānasanti hi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:203_0: Sā assādane. Rasaṁ sāyati. Sāyitaṁ, sāyanaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:204_0: Si pāṇippasave. Sūyati, pasūyati. Pasūtā gāvī.
anya-e0804n2:207_0: Kilisa upatāpe. Kilissati, saṁkilissati. Kileso, saṁkileso.
anya-e0804n2:207_2: Apica malīnatāpi kilisasaddena vuccati, kiliṭṭhavatthaṁ paridahati. ‘‘Cittena saṁkiliṭṭhena,
anya-e0804n2:210_0: Tasa pipāsāyaṁ. Tassati, paritassati. Paritassanā, tasiṇā, tasito.
anya-e0804n2:211_0: Dusa dosane. Dussati. Doso, dosanaṁ, dosito.
anya-e0804n2:212_0: Dusa appītiyaṁ. Dussati, padussati. Doso, padoso, duṭṭho, paduṭṭho, dūsako, dūsito, dūsanā.
anya-e0804n2:213_0: Asu khepe. Khepo khipanaṁ. Assati. Nirassatiādiyati ca dhammaṁ. Issāso.
anya-e0804n2:214_0: Ettha ca nirassatīti chaḍḍeti satthāraṁ tathā dhammakkhānādīni.
anya-e0804n2:214_1: Issāsoti usuṁ assati khipatīti issāso, dhanuggaho.
anya-e0804n2:216_0: Ettha ca yena vinayakammena ‘‘nissāya te vatthabba’’nti niyassiyati bhajāpiyatīti niyaso bālaṁ, taṁ niyasakammaṁ nāma.
anya-e0804n2:216_1: ‘‘Karohi me yakkha niyasakamma’’nti ettha pana niggahakammaṁ niyasakammaṁ nāma.
anya-e0804n2:218_0: Vasa sadde. Sakuṇo vassati. Adhamo migajātānaṁ, siṅgālo tāta vassati. Maṇḍūko vassati.
anya-e0804n2:219_0: Nasaadassane. Nassanadhammaṁ nassati. Panassati. Vinassati. Nassa vasali, cara pire vinassa. Naṭṭho, vinaṭṭho. Kārite – nāseti, nāsayati.
anya-e0804n2:220_0: Susa sosane. Paṇṇaṁ sussati. Kārite – vāto paṇṇaṁ soseti, sosayati.
anya-e0804n2:220_1: Kamme – vātena paṇṇaṁ sosiyati. Bhāve kriyāpadamappasiddhaṁ. Soso, sukkhaṁ kaṭṭhaṁ. Sussaṁ, sussanto. Sussamāno dahado.
anya-e0804n2:221_0: Tusa tuṭṭhiyaṁ. Tussati, santussati. Santuṭṭhi, santoso, tosanaṁ, tuṭṭhabbaṁ, tussitabbaṁ, tusitā. Kārite ‘‘toseti’’ iccādīni.
anya-e0804n2:222_0: Hā parihāniyaṁ. Hāyati, parihāyati. Hāyanti tattha vaḷavā.
anya-e0804n2:222_1: Bhāve ‘‘bhayaṁ vā chambhitattaṁ vā lomahaṁso vā,
anya-e0804n2:222_2: so pahīyissatī’’ti ca ‘‘rāgo pahīyatī’’ti ca rūpaṁ. Kamme kriyāpadamappasiddhaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:222_3: ‘‘Rāgo pahīyatī’’ti idaṁ pana ‘‘hā cāge’’ti vuttassa bhūvādigaṇikadhātussa rūpaṁ ‘‘rāgaṁ pajahatī’’ti kattupadassa dassanato.
anya-e0804n2:223_0: Naha bandhane. Nayhati. Upanayhati. Sannayhati. Sannāho. Sannaddho.
anya-e0804n2:224_0: Muha vecitte. Muyhati, sammuyhati, pamuyhati. Moho, pamoho. Mūḷho. Momūho puriso. Momūhaṁ cittaṁ. Kārite – moheti. Pamohako.
anya-e0804n2:224_1: Ettha ca momūhoti avisadatāya momūho, mahāmūḷhoti attho.
anya-e0804n2:226_1: appakkharānaṁ bahubhāve nahāyati. Nahāyitvā, nhāyitvā. Nahānaṁ, nhānaṁ. Sīsaṁ nhāto.
anya-e0804n2:226_2: Ettha ca sīsaṁ nhātoti sīsaṁ dhovitvā nhātoti attho gahetabbo porāṇehi anumatattā.
anya-e0804n2:227_0: Siniha pītiyaṁ. Siniyhati. Sinehako, sinehito, siniddho. Putte sineho ajāyatha. Ikāralopena sneho.
anya-e0804n2:228_0: Viriḷa lajjāyaṁ codane ca. Viriḷito. Lajjāvasena attho pasiddho, na codanāvasena.
anya-e0804n2:228_1: Tathā hi ‘‘viriḷitoti lajjito’’ti atthasaṁvaṇṇakā garū vadanti ‘‘lajjanākārappatto’’ti ca.
anya-e0804n2:229_0: Divādī ettakā diṭṭhā, dhātavo me yathābalaṁ;
anya-e0804n2:233_0: Su savane. ‘‘Suṇoti, suṇāti. Suṇiṁsu. Paṭissuṇi, paṭissuṇiṁsu. Assosi, assosuṁ. Paccassosi, paccassosuṁ’’ iccādīni, ‘‘suṇissati,
anya-e0804n2:233_1: sossati’’ iccādīni ca bhavanti. Abbhāsavisaye ‘‘sussūsati, sussūsā’’ iccādīni. Anabbhāsavisaye – sāvako, soto, suṇaṁ, suṇanto, suṇamāno, suyyamāno, savanaṁ, sutaṁ. Asuyitthāti vā sutaṁ. Sutavā, sotaṁ, soṇo, suṇituṁ, sotuṁ. Suṇitvā, suṇiya, suṇiyāna, sutvā, sutvāna. Kārite – sāveti, sāvayati. Kamme – saddo suyyati, sūyati ca. Bhāve padarūpamappasiddhaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:234_2: tattha āgatapphalo savanante ariyāya jātiyā jātoti ‘‘sāvako’’ti vuccati,
anya-e0804n2:234_3: itaro garūnaṁ ovādaṁ suṇātīti ‘‘sāvako’’ti. Sāvako, antevāsiko, sissoti pariyāyā.
anya-e0804n2:235_0: Ettha sutasaddassa atthuddhāraṁ vadāma saddhiṁ sotasaddassa atthuddhārena.
anya-e0804n2:235_1: Sutasaddo saupasaggo anupasaggo ca anupapadena, sutasaddo ca –
anya-e0804n2:242_4: yāni etāni sotāni mayā kittitāni pakittitāni ācikkhitāni desitāni paññapitāni paṭṭhapitāni vivaritāni vibhattāni uttānīkatāni pakāsitāni. Seyyathidaṁ?
anya-e0804n2:242_5: Taṇhāsoto diṭṭhisoto kilesasoto duccaritasoto avijjāsoto’’tiādīsu pañcasu dhammesu.
anya-e0804n2:242_6: ‘‘Addasā kho bhagavā mahantaṁ dārukkhandhaṁ gaṅgāya nadiyā sotena vuyhamāna’’ntiādīsu udakadhārāyaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:242_9: ‘‘Purisassa ca viññāṇasotaṁ pajānāti ubhayato abbocchinnaṁ idhaloke patiṭṭhitañca paraloke patiṭṭhitañcā’’tiādīsu cittasantatiyanti.
anya-e0804n2:243_1: So hi sāmikassa vacanaṁ suṇātīti soṇoti vuccati.
anya-e0804n2:245_0: Sunakho sārameyyo ca, suṇo sūno ca kukkuro;
anya-e0804n2:246_0: Soṇo svāno suvāno ca, sāḷuro migadaṁsano.
anya-e0804n2:248_0: Sunakhī kukkurī sī’ti, ime itthīsu vattare.
anya-e0804n2:251_0: Kukkuroti ayaṁ tattha, bālakāle ravena ve;
anya-e0804n2:253_0: Tathā hi aṭṭhakathācariyā kukkurajātake ‘‘ye kukkurā rājakulamhi vaḍḍhā,
anya-e0804n2:253_1: koleyyakā vaṇṇabalūpapannā’’tiimasmiṁpadese evamatthaṁ vaṇṇayiṁsu ‘‘ye kukkurāti ye sunakhā.
anya-e0804n2:253_2: Yathā hi taruṇopi passāvo pūtimuttanti tadahujātopi siṅgālo ‘‘jarasiṅgālo’ti,
anya-e0804n2:255_0: Saka sāmatthiye. Samatthabhāvo sāmatthiyaṁ, yathā dakkhiyaṁ. Sakkuṇāti, sakkuṇanti. Asakkhi. Sakkhissati. Sakko. Sakkī.
anya-e0804n2:256_1: So hi parahitaṁ sakahitañca kātuṁ sakkuṇātīti sakko.
anya-e0804n2:256_3: Tathā hi ‘‘atha kho mahānāmo sakko’’tiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:256_5: Sakyā vata bho kumārā paramasakyā vata bho kumārā’’ti vacanamupādāya sabbepi sakyakule jātā ‘‘sakyā’’ti ca ‘‘sākiyā’’ti ca ‘‘sakkā’’ti ca vuccanti.
anya-e0804n2:256_6: Ettha svādittepi anekassaradhātuto ekova uṇāpaccayo hoti, na ṇu ṇāpaccayāti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:257_0: Khīkhaye. Khīṇoti. Khīṇāti. Khīṇā jāti. Khīṇo. Ayogā bhūrisaṅkhayo.
anya-e0804n2:259_0: Ci caye. Ṇakārassa nakārattaṁ. Pākāraṁ cinoti. Citaṁ kusalaṁ. Ceto puggalo.
anya-e0804n2:261_0: Rādha sādha saṁsiddhiyaṁ. Rādhuṇāti. Sādhuṇāti. Rādhanaṁ. Ārādhanaṁ. Sādhanaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:262_0: Pī pītiyaṁ. Pīṇoti, pīṇāti. Pīti, piyo.
anya-e0804n2:263_0: Apa pāpuṇe sambhu ca. Pāpuṇoti, pāpuṇāti. Patto. Sabbaññutaṁ satthā patto. Sampatto yamasādhanaṁ. Sambhuṇāti,
anya-e0804n2:263_1: na kiñci atthaṁ abhisambhuṇāti. Sambhuṇanto, abhisambhuṇamāno.
anya-e0804n2:264_0: Tattha pattoti pasaddo upasaggo ‘‘pappotī’’ti ettha pasaddo viya.
anya-e0804n2:264_1: Tathā hi ‘‘patto’’ti ettha pāpuṇīti atthe papubbassa apadhātussa pakāre lutte tapaccayassa dvibhāvo bhavati.
anya-e0804n2:264_2: Tattha na abhisambhuṇātīti na sampāpuṇāti, na sādhetīti vuttaṁ hoti.
anya-e0804n2:265_0: Khipa khepe. Khipuṇāti. Khippaṁ. Khippanti macchapañjaro.
anya-e0804n2:268_0: Ettha ca sabbaguyhesu nimiyati pakkhipiyatīti mitto.
anya-e0804n2:268_1: ‘‘Mitto have sattapadena hotī’’ti vacanaṁ pana vohāravasena vuttaṁ, na atthavasena. Vucceyya ce,
anya-e0804n2:268_2: yo koci avissāsiko attano paṭiviruddhopi ca mitto nāma bhaveyya, na cevaṁ daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:268_3: Evañca pana daṭṭhabbaṁ ‘‘sattapadavītihāramattenapi saha gacchanto saha gacchantassa piyavācānicchāraṇena aññamaññaṁ ālāpasallāpakaraṇamattena mitto nāma hotīti vattabbaṁ. Kiṁkāraṇā?
anya-e0804n2:268_4: Daḷhavissāso mitto nāma na bhaveyyāti mittassa guṇapasaṁsāvasena evaṁ vutta’’nti.
anya-e0804n2:269_0: Vu saṁvaraṇe. Vuṇoti, vuṇāti, saṁvuṇoti, saṁvuṇāti. Paṇḍito sīlasaṁvuto.
anya-e0804n2:270_1: Abhisavo nāma pīḷanaṁ manthanaṁ sandhānaṁ sinhānaṁ vā. Suṇoti, suṇāti.
anya-e0804n2:273_0: Na hi nūnāyaṁ sā khujjā, labhati jivhāya chedanaṁ;
anya-e0804n2:279_0: Ettha pana asamānantattepi samānatthānaṁ samodhānaṁ vuccati.
anya-e0804n2:280_0: Tika tiga sagha dikkha kivi ciri jiri dāsa du hiṁsāyaṁ. Tikuṇāti. Tiguṇāti. Saghuṇāti. Dikkhuṇāti. Kivuṇāti . Ciruṇāti. Jiruṇāti. Dāsuṇāti. Duṇoti,
anya-e0804n2:281_0: Suvādī ettakā diṭṭhā, dhātavo me yathābalaṁ;
anya-e0804n2:285_1: Dabbavinimayo kayavikkayavasena bhaṇḍassa parivattanaṁ. Kiṇāti, kiṇanti. Vikkiṇāti, vikkiṇanti. Ketuṁ, kiṇituṁ. Vikketuṁ, vikkiṇituṁ. Kiṇitvā, vikkiṇitvā. Kītaṁ bhaṇḍaṁ. Kayo, vikkayo. Vikkiṇeyya haneyya vā.
anya-e0804n2:286_0: Khi gatiyaṁ. Khiṇāti. Atikhiṇo saro. Khaṁ, khāni. Nakārassa ṇakārattaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:287_3: Aṭṭhakathāyaṁ pana ‘‘cāpātikhiṇāti cāpato atikhiṇā cāpā vinimuttāti attho’’ti padatthavivaraṇaṁ kataṁ,
anya-e0804n2:287_4: tampi gatatthaññeva sandhāya adhippāyatthavasena katanti daṭṭhabbaṁ. Tatra khanti saggo.
anya-e0804n2:287_5: So hi katapuññehi gantabbattā ‘‘kha’’nti vuccati. Khānīti saggā.
anya-e0804n2:288_0: Ci caye. Puññaṁ cināti. Pākāraṁ cināti. Pāramiyo vicināti, vicinati ca. Pupphaṁ ocināti, ocinati vā. Pacināti. Pacinitvā. Citaṁ kusalaṁ. Cayo sañcayo. Cito pākāro. Cinātīti ceto, iṭṭhakavaḍḍhakī. Yo satto puññasañcayo .
anya-e0804n2:288_1: ‘‘Sañcayo rāsi samūho piṇḍo gaṇo saṅgho kadambo vaggo karo ghaṭā’’iccevamādayo pariyāyā.
anya-e0804n2:289_0: Ji jaye. Jināti, vijināti, jiniyati. Jetā, jino. Jito māro. Māraṁ jito. Jitavā, jitāvī, jitabbo, jeyyo, jayanaṁ, jitaṁ, vijitaṁ, jayo, parājayanaṁ, parājayo. Yassa jitaṁ nāvajīyati. Jitamassa noyāti koci loke.
anya-e0804n2:289_1: Jayo hi buddhassa sirīmato ayaṁ, mārassa ca pāpimato parājayo.
anya-e0804n2:290_0: Tattha jetāti jinātīti jetā, yo koci puggalo. Ajinīti jino, sabbaññū dhammarājā. Kiṁ so ajini?
anya-e0804n2:290_2: Iti pāpake akusale dhamme mārādayo ca arayo ajinīti jino. Vuttampi cetaṁ –
anya-e0804n2:291_0: ‘‘Mādisā ve jinā honti, ye pattā āsavakkhayaṁ;
anya-e0804n2:292_0: Jitā me pāpakā dhammā, tasmāhaṁ upaka jino’’ti,
anya-e0804n2:294_1: sopapado pana paccekabuddhādīsu tamhi ca yathārahaṁ pavattati. ‘‘Paccekajino, odhijino, anodhijino, vipākajino,
anya-e0804n2:295_0: Ji jāniyaṁ. Jināti, na jināti na jāpaye,
anya-e0804n2:295_2: putte ca dāre ca tatheva jino. Jino dhanañca dāse ca.
anya-e0804n2:296_0: Ñāavabodhane. Jānāti, ñāyati, nāyati. Animittā na nāyare. Jaññā so yadi hāpaye. Mā maṁ jaññūti icchati.
anya-e0804n2:296_1: ‘‘Ime amhāka’’nti ñātabbaṭṭhena ñāti, ñātako. Ñātimittā suhajjā ca. Ñātako no nisinnoti. Ñātabbaṁ ñeyyaṁ,
anya-e0804n2:296_3: Īdisesu ṭhānesu ñeyyasaddo ekantena napuṁsako, vāccaliṅgatte sabbaliṅgiko, yathā? Ñeyyo phasso. Ñeyyā vedanā. Ñeyyaṁ cittaṁ. Ñeyyo puriso, ñeyyā itthī, ñeyyaṁ dhananti ca.
anya-e0804n2:297_0: Thu abhitthave. Thunāti. Abhitthunāti. Thuti, abhitthuti. Thavanā, abhitthavanā, thuto, abhitthuto.
anya-e0804n2:305_0: Ettha mittaddūti mittaṁ dunāti hiṁsati dubbhatīti mittaddu.
anya-e0804n2:306_0: Dhū kampane. Dhunāti. Dhūmo, dhonā, dhono, dhuto. Dhunanto vākacīrāni, gacchāmi ambare tadā.
anya-e0804n2:307_1: Dhūmasaddo kodhe taṇhāya vitakke pañcasu kāmaguṇesu dhammadesanāyaṁ pakatidhūmeti imesu atthesu vattati.
anya-e0804n2:307_2: ‘‘Kodho dhūmo bhasmāni mosavajja’’nti ettha hi kodhe vattati.
anya-e0804n2:307_4: ‘‘Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu bhagavato avidūre dhūmāyanto nisinno hotī’’ti ettha vitakke.
anya-e0804n2:310_0: Rajo ca dhūmo ca mayā pakāsito,
anya-e0804n2:312_1: ‘‘Dhūmaṁ kattā hotī’’ti ettha dhammadesanāyaṁ. ‘‘Dhajo rathassa paññāno,
anya-e0804n2:315_4: Yaṁ tāya paññāya kāyaduccaritaṁ dhutañca dhotañca sandhotañca niddhotañca,
anya-e0804n2:315_5: vacīduccaritaṁ manoduccaritaṁ dhutañca dhotañca sandhotañca niddhotañca.
anya-e0804n2:315_7: Atha vā sammādiṭṭhi micchādiṭṭhiṁ dhutā ca dhotā ca sandhotā ca niddhotā ca,
anya-e0804n2:315_10: pakappitā diṭṭhi bhavābhavesū’’ti ayamettha pāḷi nidassanaṁ .
anya-e0804n2:315_11: Atra dhonā assa atthīti dhono, tassa dhonassāti nibbacanaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:316_1: Imasmiṁ ṭhāne dhātuyā ākhyātatte ekantena antalopo bhavati.
anya-e0804n2:316_2: Sobhitattheragāthāyaṁ pana anāgatavacane ukārassa vuddhivasena ‘‘ahaṁ monena monissa’’nti rūpantarañca dissati. Tattha monissanti jānissaṁ. Nāmatte antalopo na hoti.
anya-e0804n2:316_3: Tattha monanti kiñcāpi ‘‘na monena muni hotī’’ti ettha tuṇhībhāvo ‘‘mona’’nti vuccati,
anya-e0804n2:316_4: tathāpi idha ‘‘ñāṇe’’ti vacanato na so adhippeto, ñāṇamevādhippetaṁ,
anya-e0804n2:316_6: Munīti munāti jānāti hitāhitaṁ paricchindatīti muni.
anya-e0804n2:316_7: Atha vā khandhādiloke tulaṁ āropetvā minanto viya ‘‘ime ajjhattikā khandhā,
anya-e0804n2:316_8: ime bāhirā’’tiādinā nayena ime ubho atthe munātīti muni. Tenāha bhagavā –
anya-e0804n2:318_0: Yo ca tulaṁva paggayha, varamādāya paṇḍito.
anya-e0804n2:319_0: Pāpāni parivajjeti, sa muni tena so muni;
anya-e0804n2:320_0: Yo munāti ubho loke, muni tena pavuccatī’’ti.
anya-e0804n2:321_0: Aparāpettha bhavati atthavibhāvanā. Munīti monaṁ vuccati ñāṇaṁ,
anya-e0804n2:321_3: So panesa agāriyamuni anagāriyamuni sekkhamuni asekkhamuni paccekamuni munimunīti anekavidho .
anya-e0804n2:321_5: Anagāriyamunīti tathārūpova pabbajito. Sekkhamunīti satta sekkhā. Asekkhamunīti khīṇāsavo. Paccekamunīti paccekabuddho. Munimunīti sammāsambuddho.
anya-e0804n2:321_6: Tathā hi āyasmāpi sāriputto āha ‘‘munīti vuccati tathāgato arahaṁ sammāsambuddho’’ti.
anya-e0804n2:322_0: Pū pavane. Pavanaṁ sodhanaṁ. Punāti. Puññaṁ, putto, dantapoṇaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:323_0: Ettha ca puññanti attano kārakaṁ punāti sodhetīti puññaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:323_1: Atha vā yattha sayaṁ uppannaṁ taṁsantānaṁ punāti visodhetīti puññaṁ. Kintaṁ? Sucaritaṁ kusalakammaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:323_3: Puttoti attano kulaṁ punāti sodhetīti putto.
anya-e0804n2:323_4: Evañca sati hīnajaccānaṁ caṇḍālādīnaṁ putto nāma na bhaveyyāti na vattabbaṁ saddānamatthakathanassa nānappakārena pavattito,
anya-e0804n2:323_5: tasmā attano pitu hadayaṁ pūretīti puttoti evamādināpi nibbacanaṁ gahetabbameva.
anya-e0804n2:324_0: Putto ca nāma atrajo khetrajo antevāsiko dinnakoti catubbidho.
anya-e0804n2:324_1: Tattha attānaṁ paṭicca jāto atrajo nāma.
anya-e0804n2:324_2: Sayanapīṭhe pallaṅke ureti evamādīsu nibbatto khetrajo nāma.
anya-e0804n2:324_4: Posāpanatthāya dinno dinnako nāma dantapoṇanti dante punanti visodhenti etenāti dantapoṇaṁ, dantakaṭṭhaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:325_2: tappanaṁ kantīti ca vuttaṁ hoti. Idaṁ bhāvavasena nibbacanaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:325_3: Idaṁ pana hetukattuvasena piṇayatīti pīti, tappetīti attho.
anya-e0804n2:326_0: Sā panesā khuddakāpīti khaṇikāpīti okkantikāpīti ubbegāpīti pharaṇāpītīti pañcavidhā hoti.
anya-e0804n2:326_1: Tattha khuddakāpīti sarīre lomahaṁsanamattameva kātuṁ sakkoti.
anya-e0804n2:326_3: Okkantikāpīti samuddatīraṁ vīci viya kāyaṁ okkamitvā okkamitvā bhijjati.
anya-e0804n2:326_4: Ubbegāpīti balavatī hoti kāyaṁ uddhaggaṁ katvā ākāse laṅghāpanappamāṇā hoti.
anya-e0804n2:326_5: Pharaṇāpītiyā pana uppannāya sakalasarīraṁ dhamitvā pūritavatthi viya mahatā udakoghena pakkhandapabbatakucchi viya ca anupariphuṭaṁ hoti, evaṁ pañcavidhā pīti,
anya-e0804n2:326_6: sā sampiyāyanalakkhaṇattā ‘‘piṇātī’’ti pītīti suddhakattuvasenapi vattuṁ yujjati. Ettha ‘‘piyāyati, pitā, piyo,
anya-e0804n2:326_8: Tattha ‘‘puttaṁ piyāyatīti pitā’’ti vadanti. Piyāyitabboti piyo. Pemanaṁ pemo.
anya-e0804n2:327_0: Mā parimāṇe. Mināti. Mānaṁ, parimāṇaṁ, mattaṁ, mattā, mano, vimānaṁ, minitabbaṁ, metabbaṁ, chāyā metabbā.
anya-e0804n2:328_0: Ettha manoti ekāya nāḷiyā ekāya ca tulāya minamāno viya ārammaṇaṁ mināti paricchindatīti mano.
anya-e0804n2:328_2: devānaṁ puññabalena nibbattabyamhaṁ devaniketaṁ. Yaṁ vimānaṁ upasobhitaṁ,
anya-e0804n2:330_1: Macchassa hi ‘‘mīno maccho ambujo vārijo vāricaro’’ti anekāni nāmāni.
anya-e0804n2:330_2: Visesanāmāni pana ‘‘amaro khaliso candakulo kandaphali indaphali indavalo kuliso vāmi kuṅkutalo kaṇḍiko sakulo maṅguro siṅgī satavaṅko rohito pāṭhīno kāṇo savaṅko pāvuso’’ iccevamādīni,
anya-e0804n2:330_4: Kumīnanti kucchitenākārena macche minanti hiṁsanti etenāti kumīnaṁ, macchabandhanapañjaro.
anya-e0804n2:330_5: So pana pāḷiyaṁ kumīnasaddena vuccati. Tathā hi –
anya-e0804n2:335_0: Ettha munīti attano cittaṁ munāti mavati bandhati rāgadosādivasaṁ gantuṁ na detīti muni.
anya-e0804n2:336_0: Ri gatidesanesu. Rikāti. Reṇu. Nakārassa ṇattaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:337_0: Lī silese. Lināti, nilināti. Līnaṁ, sallīnaṁ, paṭisallānaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:338_0: Vī tantasantāne. Vatthaṁ vināti. Iminā suttena cīvaraṁ vināhi.
anya-e0804n2:338_1: Kamme – idaṁ kho āvuso cīvaraṁ maṁ uddissa viyyati. Vītaṁ. Suvītaṁ. Appakaṁ hoti vetabbaṁ. Kārite ‘‘vāyāpeti,
anya-e0804n2:338_2: tantavāyehi cīvaraṁ vāyāpessāmā’ti cīvaraṁ vāyāpesuṁ’’ iccevamādīni bhavanti.
anya-e0804n2:339_0: Vī hiṁsāyaṁ. Vināti. Veṇu. Veṇūti vaṁso.
anya-e0804n2:340_0: Lū chedane. Lunāti. Loṇaṁ, kusalaṁ, bālo, lūto.
anya-e0804n2:341_0: Ettha ca loṇanti lunāti vītarasabhāvaṁ vināseti sarasabhāvaṁ karotīti loṇaṁ, lavaṇaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:341_1: Kuso viya hatthappadesaṁ akusaladhamme lunātīti kusalaṁ,
anya-e0804n2:341_3: Diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyike dve atthe lunātīti bālo, avidvā. Lūtoti makkaṭako vuccati.
anya-e0804n2:341_5: Yūsaṁ pātuṁ paṭaṅgamakkhikādīnaṁ jīvitaṁ lunātīti lūto.
anya-e0804n2:343_0: Ettha sīmāti sinīyate samaggena saṅghena kammavācāya bandhiyateti sīmā.
anya-e0804n2:343_3: Sināti bandhati kese moḷikaraṇavasena etthāti sīsaṁ. Aññānipi yojetabbāni.
anya-e0804n2:349_0: Ettha ca kilesoti rāgādayopi dukkhampi vuccati.
anya-e0804n2:356_0: Kiyādī ettakā diṭṭhā, dhātavo me yathābalaṁ;
anya-e0804n2:364_0: Idāni gahādigaṇo vuccate. Ettheke evaṁ maññanti.
anya-e0804n2:367_0: Yato ppaṇhā parā heyyuṁ, dhātuto jinasāsane;
anya-e0804n2:368_0: Tepi aññe na vijjanti, aññatra gahadhātuyā.
anya-e0804n2:370_0: Pakkhipiṁsu gaṇe evaṁ, na vadiṁsu gahādikaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:371_0: Na tesaṁ gahaṇaṁ dhīro, gaṇheyya suvicakkhaṇo;
anya-e0804n2:372_0: Yato kaccāyane vutto, gahādīnaṁ gaṇo visuṁ.
anya-e0804n2:373_0: ‘‘Gahādito ppaṇhā’’ iti, lakkhaṇaṁ vadatā hi so;
anya-e0804n2:375_0: Sace visuṁ gahādīnaṁ, gaṇo nāma na labbhati;
anya-e0804n2:377_0: ‘‘Gahato ppaṇhā’’ icceva, vattabbaṁ atha vā pana;
anya-e0804n2:379_0: Yasmā tathā na vuttañca, na katañcekalakkhaṇaṁ;
anya-e0804n2:380_0: Tasmā ayaṁ visuṁyeva, gaṇo icceva ñāyati.
anya-e0804n2:386_0: Sappayogaṁ gahādīnaṁ, gaṇaṁ vakkhāmi me suṇa.
anya-e0804n2:387_0: Gaha upādāne. Upādānaṁ gahaṇaṁ, na kilesupādānaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:387_1: Upasaddo hettha na kiñci atthavisesaṁ vadati.
anya-e0804n2:387_2: Atha vā kāyena cittena vā upagantvā ādānaṁ gahaṇaṁ upādānanti samīpattho upasaddo.
anya-e0804n2:387_3: Katthaci hi upasaddo ādānasaddasahito daḷhaggahaṇe vattati ‘‘kāmupādāna’’ntiādīsu.
anya-e0804n2:387_4: Idha pana daḷhaggahaṇaṁ vā hotu sithilaggahaṇaṁ vā,
anya-e0804n2:387_6: tasmā gahadhātu gahaṇe vattatīti attho gahetabbo. Gheppati, gaṇhāti vā. Pariggaṇhāti, paṭiggaṇhāti, adhigaṇhāti, paggaṇhāti, niggaṇhāti. Padhānagaṇhanako. Gaṇhituṁ, uggaṇhituṁ. Gaṇhitvā, uggaṇhitvā. Aññathāpi rūpāni bhavanti. Ahaṁ jāliṁ gahessāmi. Gahetuṁ. Gahetvā. Uggāhako, saṅgāhako, ajjhogāḷho. Kārite ‘‘gaṇhāpeti, gaṇhāpayati,
anya-e0804n2:387_8: saddhiṁ amaccasahassena gaṇhāpetvā. Upajjhaṁ gāhāpetabbo. Upajjhaṁ gāhāpetvā . Gāheti, gāhayati, gāhāpessati. Gāhāpayanti sabbhāvaṁ. Gāhako, gāhetvā’’ iccādīni. Kammani – gayhati, saṅgayhati, gaṇhiyati vā.
anya-e0804n2:387_9: Tathā hi ‘‘gaṇhiyanti uggaṇhiyantī’’ti niddesapāḷi dissati. ‘‘Gehaṁ, gāho, pariggaho, saṅgāhako,
anya-e0804n2:388_0: Tatra akārānantaratyantapadānaṁ ‘‘gheppati, gheppanti. Gheppasī’’ti ca ‘‘gaṇhati, gaṇhanti.
anya-e0804n2:388_1: Gaṇhasī’’ti ca ādinā nayena sabbāsu vibhattīsu sabbathā padamālā yojetabbā.
anya-e0804n2:388_2: Ākārekārānantaratyantapadānaṁ ‘‘gaṇhāti gaṇhāpetī’’tiādinā yathāsambhavaṁ padamālā yojetabbā vajjetabbaṭṭhānaṁ vajjetvā.
anya-e0804n2:389_0: Imāni pana pasiddhāni kānici ajjatanīrūpāni ‘‘aggahī mattikāpattaṁ. Aggahuṁ, aggahiṁsu, aggahesu’’nti. Bhavissantīādīsu gahessati, gahessanti. Sesaṁ paripuṇṇaṁ kātabbaṁ. Aggahissā, aggahissaṁsu. Sesaṁ paripuṇṇaṁ kātabbaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:390_0: Usa dāhe. Dāho uṇhaṁ. Usati dahatīti uṇhaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:390_2: ‘‘sītaṁ uṇhaṁ paṭihanatī’’tiādīsu pana guṇaṁ uṇhabhāvassa icchitattā.
anya-e0804n2:392_0: Jusi pītisevanesu. Juṇho samayo. Kāḷe vā yadi vā juṇhe, yadā vāyati māluto.
anya-e0804n2:393_0: Tattha juṇhoti joseti lokassa pītiṁsomanassañca uppādetīti juṇho.
anya-e0804n2:394_1: Jotati sayaṁ nippabhāpi samānā candatārakappabhāsenapi dibbati virocati sappabhā hotīti juṇhā.
anya-e0804n2:396_1: Siyati sayaṁ sukhumabhāvena atisukhumampi atthaṁ antaṁ karoti nipphattiṁ pāpetīti saṇhaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:397_0: Tija nisāne. Nisānaṁ tikkhatā. Tiṇho parasu. Titikkhatīti tiṇho.
anya-e0804n2:398_3: Apica sippanti aṭṭhārasa mahāsippāni – suti sūramati byākaraṇaṁ chandoviciti nirutti jotisatthaṁ sikkhā mokkhañāṇaṁ kriyāvidhi dhanubbedo hatthisikkhā kāmatantaṁ assalakkhaṇaṁ purāṇaṁ itihāso nīti takko vejjakañcāti.
anya-e0804n2:399_0: Ku kucchāyaṁ. Kucchā garahā. Kaṇhā dhammā. Kaṇho puriso.
anya-e0804n2:400_0: Tattha kaṇhāti apabhassarabhāvakaraṇattā paṇḍitehi kucchitabbā garahitabbāti kaṇhā, akusaladhammā.
anya-e0804n2:400_1: Kāḷavaṇṇattā suvaṇṇavaṇṇādikaṁ upanidhāya kucchitabbo ninditabboti kaṇho, kāḷavaṇṇo. Vuttampi cetaṁ –
anya-e0804n2:402_0: Kaṇhe bhūmippadesasmiṁ, na mayhaṁ manaso piyo’’ti ca,
anya-e0804n2:411_0: Ākhyātatte ca nāmatte, ṇhāsaddo usato tathā.
anya-e0804n2:414_0: Ettha pana kiñcāpi sāsane ‘‘taṇhāyatī’’ti kriyāpadampi dissati, tathāpi tassa ‘‘pabbatāyati,
anya-e0804n2:414_1: mettāyatī’’tiādīni viya nāmasmā vihitassa āyapaccayassa vasena siddhattā kriyāpadattepi ṇhāpaccayo mukhyato labbhatīti na sakkā vattuṁ.
anya-e0804n2:414_2: ‘‘Taṇhāyatī’’ti hi idaṁ ṇhāpaccayavatā tasadhātuto nipphannataṇhāsaddasmā parassa āyapaccayassa vasena nipphannaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:414_3: Tathā kiñcāpi rūpiyasaṁvohārasikkhāpadavaṇṇanāyaṁ ‘‘vāsiphalaṁ tāpetvā udakaṁ vā khīraṁ vā uṇhāpetī’’ti imasmiṁ padese ‘‘uṇhāpetī’’ti hetukattuvācakaṁ kriyāpadaṁ dissati,
anya-e0804n2:414_4: tathāpi tassa ṇhāpaccayavatā usadhātuto nipphannauṇhāsaddato vihitassa kāritasaññassa ṇāpepaccayassa vasena nipphannattā kriyāpadattepi ṇhāpaccayo mukhyato labbhatīti na sakkā vattuṁ.
anya-e0804n2:415_0: Kiñca bhiyyo vinayaṭṭhakathāyaṁ ‘‘uṇhāpetī’’ti kāritapadassa diṭṭhattāyeva ‘‘uṇhatī’’ti kattupadampi nayato diṭṭhameva hoti kattukāritapadānaṁ ekadhātumhi upalabbhamānattā, yathā? Gaṇhati, gaṇhāpeti, gacchati, gacchāpetīti,
anya-e0804n2:415_1: tasmā ‘‘usa dāhe’’ti dhātussa ‘‘uṇhatī’’ti rūpaṁ upalabbhatīti mantvā ‘‘uṇhatīti uṇha’’nti nibbacanaṁ kātabbaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:415_2: Iti ppapaccayo gahato ca aññato ca ekadhā labbhati,
anya-e0804n2:415_3: ṇhāpaccayo pana gahato usato ca dvidhā aññato ekadhā labbhatīti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:415_5: tathāpi sāṭṭhakathe tepiṭake buddhavacane aññānipi ekekassa dhātussa nāmikapadāni dve dve kriyāpadāni vicinitabbāni.
anya-e0804n2:415_6: Yena pana buddhavacanānurūpena nayena gahādigaṇe ādisaddena tasadhātādayo amhehi gahitā,
anya-e0804n2:415_7: imasmā nayā añño nayo pasatthataro natthi, ayameva pasatthataro,
anya-e0804n2:415_8: tasmā ayaṁ nīti sāsanaṭṭhitiyā āyasmantehi sādhukaṁ dhāretabbā vācetabbā ca.
anya-e0804n2:416_0: Gahādī ettakā diṭṭhā, dhātavo me yathābalaṁ;
anya-e0804n2:420_0: Tanu vitthāre. Tanoti. Āyatanaṁ, tanu. Kammani ‘‘taniyyati, taniyyanti. Vitaniyyatī’’ti rūpāni.
anya-e0804n2:420_1: Atrāyaṁ pāḷi ‘‘yathā hi āsabhaṁ cammaṁ, pathabyā vitaniyyatī’’ti. Garū pana ‘‘patāyate, pataññatī’’ti rūpāni vadanti. Tanituṁ, tanitvāna. Tumantādirūpāni.
anya-e0804n2:421_0: Tattha āyatananti āyabhūte dhamme tanoti vitthāretīti āyatanaṁ. Tanūti sarīraṁ.
anya-e0804n2:421_1: Tañhi kalalato paṭṭhāya kammādīhi yathāsambhavaṁ taniyyati vitthāriyati mahattaṁ pāpiyatīti ‘‘tanū’’ti vuccati.
anya-e0804n2:421_2: ‘‘Tanu vapu sarīraṁ puṁ kāyo deho’’tiādayo sarīravācakā saddā. Sarīraṁ khandhapañcakaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:421_5: na tato attā vā attaniyaṁ vā upalabbhati.
anya-e0804n2:421_7: appatthavācakassa ca tassa kriyāpadaṁ na passāma,
anya-e0804n2:422_0: Tanoti, tanonti. Tanosi, tanotha. Tanomi, tanoma. Tanute, tanunte. Tanuse, tanuse, tanuvhe. Tane, tanumhe.
anya-e0804n2:423_0: Tanotu, tanontu. Taneyya, tane, taneyyuṁ. Vitana, vitanu. Atanā, atanu. Ammāya patanu kesā. Atani, ataniṁsu. Tanissati, tanissanti. Atanissā, atanissaṁsu. Kammani ‘‘taniyyati, taniyyanti.
anya-e0804n2:424_0: Saka sattiyaṁ. Satti samatthabhāvo. Sakkoti sakko. Viññāpetuṁ asakkhi. Sakkhissasi. Sakkhati.
anya-e0804n2:425_1: So hi atthānaṁ sahassampi muhuttena cintanasamatthatāya saparahitaṁ kātuṁ sakkotīti ‘‘sakko’’ti vuccati.
anya-e0804n2:425_2: Aññatra pana dhātūnaṁ avisaye taddhitavasena sakkaccaṁ dānaṁ adāsīti sakkoti evampi atthaṁ gahetvā sakkasaddo niruttinayena sādhetabbo.
anya-e0804n2:425_3: Vuttañhi bhagavatā ‘‘sakko mahāli devānamindo pubbe manussabhūto samāno sakkaccaṁ dānaṁ adāsi, tasmā ‘sakko’ti vuccatī’’ti. Sakkonto. Sakkontī. Sakkontaṁ kulaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:428_0: Tiṇu adane. Tiṇoti. Tiṇaṁ. Ettha tiṇanti yavasaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:428_1: Tañhi tiṇiyate tiṇabhakkhehi goṇādīhi adiyate khādiyateti tiṇaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:432_0: Manu bodhane. Manoti. Manute. Mano. Manaṁ. Mānasaṁ. Manusso. Mānavo. Māṇavo.
anya-e0804n2:433_0: Ettha manoti manute bujjhatīti mano, evaṁ manaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:433_1: Imesaṁ pana dvinnaṁ manasaddānaṁ ‘‘yasmiṁ mano nivisati.
anya-e0804n2:433_2: Santaṁ tassa manaṁ hotī’’tiādīsu punnapuṁsakaliṅgatā daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0804n2:433_4: yvāyaṁ carati mānaso’’ti ettha hi rāgo mānasaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:433_6: kālaṁ kayirā jane suto’’ti ettha arahattaṁ. Etthetaṁ vuccati –
anya-e0804n2:436_1: Mano eva mānasanti katvā cittaṁ mānasaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:436_2: Anavasesato mānaṁ siyati samucchindatīti aggamaggo mānasaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:436_3: Tannibbattattā pana arahattassa mānasatā daṭṭhabbā. Manūti satto. ‘‘Yena cakkhupasādena,
anya-e0804n2:436_4: rūpāni manu passatī’’ti ettha hi ‘‘manū’’ti satto vutto.
anya-e0804n2:436_5: Atha vā manūti paṭhamakappikakāle manussānaṁ mātāpibhuṭṭhāne ṭhito manunāmako puriso,
anya-e0804n2:436_7: So hi sakalalokassa hitaṁ kātuṁ manute jānātīti ‘‘manū’’ti vuccati.
anya-e0804n2:436_8: Yathābalaṁ attano hitaṁ manute jānātīti manusso,
anya-e0804n2:436_10: Atha vā vuttappakārassa manuno apaccaṁ manusso. Evaṁ mānavo māṇavo ca,
anya-e0804n2:436_11: nakārassa hi ṇakāre kate ‘‘māṇavo’’ti rūpaṁ sijjhati.
anya-e0804n2:436_13: muddhajaṇakārasahito pana māṇavasaddo kucchitamūḷhāpaccavacano’’ti, taṁ vīmaṁsitvā yuttañce, gahetabbaṁ,
anya-e0804n2:436_14: na panettha vattabbaṁ ‘‘māṇavasaddassa atthuddhāravacane idaṁ vacanaṁ virujjhatī’’ti antarasaddassa atthuddhāre antaraantarikāsaddānampi āharaṇassa dassanato.
anya-e0804n2:437_0: Tatra panāyaṁ vīmaṁsanā – cūḷakammavibhaṅgasuttasmiñhi ‘‘subho māṇavotodeyyaputto’’ti imasmiṁ padese aṭṭhakathācariyehi ‘‘subhoti so kira dassanīyo ahosi pāsādiko,
anya-e0804n2:437_3: so mahallakakālepi teneva vohārena vohariyatī’’ti evaṁ muddhajaṇakārassa māṇavasaddassa attho pakāsito,
anya-e0804n2:437_4: taṭṭīkāyampi garūhi ‘‘yaṁ apaccaṁ kucchitaṁ muddhaṁ vā, tattha loke māṇavavohāro,
anya-e0804n2:437_5: yebhuyyena ca sattā daharakāle muddhadhātukā hontīti vuttaṁ ‘taruṇakāle vohariṁsū’’ti,
anya-e0804n2:437_8: māṇavoti sattopi coropi taruṇopi vuccati. ‘‘Coditā devadūtehi,
anya-e0804n2:437_9: ye pamajjanti māṇavā’’tiādīsu hi satto ‘‘māṇavo’’ti vutto.
anya-e0804n2:439_0: Ettha āpoti appoti taṁ taṁ ṭhānaṁ vissaratīti āpo.
anya-e0804n2:440_0: Mā parimāṇe. Minoti. Upamā, upamānaṁ, vimānaṁ. Aññānipi yojetabbāni.
anya-e0804n2:441_0: Ettha ca yā accantaṁ na minoti na vicchindati,
anya-e0804n2:441_1: sā mānassa samīpe vattatīti upamā yathā ‘‘goṇo viya gavajo’’ti. Upamānanti upamā eva.
anya-e0804n2:441_3: Ettha vītopamānanti imassa vītopamaṁ, nirupamanti attho.
anya-e0804n2:441_4: Atha vā upamānanti upametabbākāro ‘‘sīho viya bhagavā’’ti. Ettha hi sīho upamā,
anya-e0804n2:441_7: Ettha pana sātisayattā kiñcāpi sīhassa tejādīhi bhagavato tejādiupametabbākāro natthi,
anya-e0804n2:441_8: tathāpi hīnūpamāvasena ‘‘sīho viya bhagavā’’ti vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:441_9: Vimānanti utusamuṭṭhānattepi kammapaccayautusamuṭṭhānattā kammena visesato miniyati paricchindiyatīti vimānaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:442_0: Kara karaṇe. ‘‘Karoti, kayirati, kubbati, krubbati, pakaroti, upakaroti, apakaroti, paṭikaroti, nirākaroti, paṭisaṅkharoti,
anya-e0804n2:442_3: Tasmiṁyevaṭhāne rayakārānaṁ vipariyāye sati na dvebhāvo.
anya-e0804n2:442_4: Tathā īkārāgamaṭṭhāne ‘‘kariyyati, kayirati, karīyati, kayyati, pakarīyati, pakariyyati, paṭisaṅkhariyyati,
anya-e0804n2:443_0: Ettha ca kayiratīti padaṁ dvīsu ṭhānesu dissati kattari kamme ca.
anya-e0804n2:443_2: kammavasena pana ayaṁ pāḷi ‘‘kuṭi me kayirati adesitavatthukā’’ti.
anya-e0804n2:443_3: Tattha ca kattuvasena vuttaṁ kattupadaṁ yirapaccayena siddhaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:443_4: Kammavasena pana vuttaṁ kammapadaṁ ikārāgamassa ādiantabhūtānaṁ rayakārānaṁ vipariyāyenāti daṭṭhabbaṁ. ‘‘Kāreti, kārayati, kārāpeti,
anya-e0804n2:444_1: tatra paṭhamaṁ ‘‘kubbatī’’ti padasseva padamālaṁ yojessāma sabbāsu vibhattīsu ekākārena yojetabbattā.
anya-e0804n2:444_2: ‘‘Karotī’’ti okārānantaratyantapadassa pana ‘‘kāretī’’ti ekārānantaratyantapadassa ca padamālaṁ yathāsambhavaṁ pacchā yojessāma ekākārena ayojetabbattā.
anya-e0804n2:445_0: Tatra kubbati, kubbanti. Kubbasi, kubbatha. Kubbāmi, kubbāma. Kubbate, kubbante. Kubbase, kubbavhe. Kubbe, kubbamhe. Vattamānāvasena vuttarūpāni.
anya-e0804n2:446_0: Pañcamiyādīnaṁ vasena pana kubbatu, kubbantu. Kubbeyya, kubbeyyuṁ. Sesaṁ ‘‘bhavati,
anya-e0804n2:447_0: ‘‘Kariyatī’’tiādīnipi a kārānantaratyantapadāni evameva yojetabbāni. Ettha ca ‘‘kubbati, kubbanti.
anya-e0804n2:447_1: Kubbasī’’tiādinā vuttā ayaṁ padamālā pāḷinayadassanato edisī vuttā.
anya-e0804n2:447_2: Saddasatthavidū pana sāsanikā saddasattheyeva ādaraṁ katvā ‘‘kubbati,
anya-e0804n2:447_3: kubbasī’’ti evaṁpakārāni rūpāni pāḷiyaṁ natthīti maññantā na icchanti.
anya-e0804n2:447_4: Tehi saddasatthe viya pāḷiyampi ‘‘asanto nānukubbantī’’tiādīsu okārapaccayassādesabhūto ukāro sareyeva pare vakāraṁ pappotīti maññamānā ‘‘kubbanti,
anya-e0804n2:447_8: Mayaṁ pana pāḷinayadassanato tāni rūpāni icchāma.
anya-e0804n2:447_9: Atra sotārānaṁ kaṅkhāvinodanatthaṁ kiñci pāḷinayaṁ vadāma – ‘‘sīlavanto na kubbanti, bālo sīlāni kubbatī’’ti ca,
anya-e0804n2:447_10: ‘‘kasmā bhavaṁ vijanamaraññanissito, tapo idha krubbatī’’ti ca,
anya-e0804n2:447_12: Īdisesu pana ṭhānesu akārāgamo kātabbo . Acinteyyo hi pāḷinayo,
anya-e0804n2:447_14: Tathā hi yathā ‘‘agginiṁ sampajjalitaṁ pavisantī’’ti pāḷigatidassanato ‘‘aggini, agginī, agginayo. Agginiṁ, agginī, agginayo.
anya-e0804n2:448_0: Yathā ca ‘‘bahumpetaṁ asabbhi jātavedā’’ti pāḷigatidassanato ‘‘santo sabbhīhi saddhiṁ sataṁ dhammo na jaraṁ upetīti pavedayantī’’ti aṭṭhakathāgatidassanato ca ‘‘sabbhi, sabbhī, sabbhayo. Sabbhiṁ, sabbhī, sabbhayo.
anya-e0804n2:449_0: Idāni yathāpaṭiññātā padamālā anuppattā. Karoti, karonti. Karosi, karotha. Karomi, kummi, karoma, kumma. Kurute, kubbante. Kuruse, kuruvhe. Kare, karumhe. Vattamānāvasena vuttarūpāni.
anya-e0804n2:450_0: Karotu, kurutu, karontu. Karohi, karotha. Karomi, kummi, karoma, kumma. Kurutaṁ, kubbantaṁ. Karassu, kurussu, kuruvho. Kare, kubbāmase. Pañcamīvasena vuttarūpāni.
anya-e0804n2:453_0: Taṁ vivāhaṁ asaṁyuttaṁ, kathaṁ amhe karomase’’ti
anya-e0804n2:454_0: Pāḷidassanato ‘‘karomase’’ti padaṁ kasmā idha na vuttaṁ,
anya-e0804n2:454_1: nanu karadhātuto paraṁ okāraṁ paṭicca āmasevacanassāvayavabhūto ākāro lopaṁ pappotīti? Tanna,
anya-e0804n2:454_2: ‘‘karomase’’ti ettha ‘‘āmase’’ti vacanassa abhāvato mavacanassa sabbhāvato. Ettha hi sekāro āgamo,
anya-e0804n2:454_3: tasmā ‘‘karomā’’ti vattamānāvacanavasena attho gahetabbo, na pana pañcamīvacanavasena.
anya-e0804n2:454_4: Evaṁbhūto ca sekāro katthaci nāmikapadato paro hoti ‘‘ye keci buddhaṁ saraṇaṁ gatāse.
anya-e0804n2:456_0: Sutaṁ netaṁ abhiṇhaso, tasmā evaṁ vademase’’ti
anya-e0804n2:458_0: Kareyya, kareyyuṁ. Kareyyāsi, kareyyātha. Kareyyāmi, kareyyāma. Kubbetha, kubberaṁ. Kubbetho, kubbeyyavho. Kareyyaṁ, kare, kareyyāmhe. Sattamīvasena vuttarūpāni.
anya-e0804n2:459_0: Kara, karu. Kare, karittha. Karaṁ, karimha. Karittha, karire. Karittho, karivho. Kariṁ, karimhe. Parokkhāvasena vuttarūpāni.
anya-e0804n2:460_0: Ettha karāti puriso kammaṁ karīti paṭhamapurisayojanāya yojetabbaṁ. ‘‘Āguṁ kara mahārāja,
anya-e0804n2:460_1: akaraṁ kammadukkaṭa’’nti etthāpi ‘‘mahārāja bhavaṁ āguṁ karī’’ti paṭhamapurisayojanāya yojetabbaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:460_2: Evañhi sati ayaṁ payogo ‘‘maññe bhavaṁ patthayati,
anya-e0804n2:460_3: rañño bhariyaṁ patibbata’’ntiādayo viya paṭhamapurisappayogo bhavati.
anya-e0804n2:461_0: Jātakaṭṭhakathāyaṁ pana majjhimapurisappayogo vutto ‘‘āguṁ karāti mahārāja tvaṁ mahāparādhaṁ mahāpāpaṁ kari.
anya-e0804n2:461_1: Dukkaṭanti yaṁ kataṁ dukkaṭaṁ hoti,taṁ lāmakaṁ kammaṁ akara’’nti,
anya-e0804n2:461_2: tasmā jātakaṭṭhakathāvasenāpi kadāci karaiti ca karīti ca akaranti ca majjhimapurisappayogo bhavatīti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:461_3: Yebhuyyavasena pana ‘‘puriso kammaṁ kara, puriso kammaṁ kari,
anya-e0804n2:461_5: Ettha ca karaiti yathāvuttavibhattivasena, karīti ajjatanīvasena,
anya-e0804n2:461_8: mā kisittho mayā vinā’’ti ettha ‘‘kisittho’’ti padena samaṁ parokkhāyattanopadamajjhimapurisekavacanavasena,
anya-e0804n2:461_9: ediso pana nayo aññatrāpi yathāsambhavaṁ yojetabbo.
anya-e0804n2:462_0: Akā, akarā, akara iti rassapāṭhopi. Akaru.
anya-e0804n2:462_2: Akarāti puriso kammaṁ akāsīti atītakriyāvācako paṭhamapurisappayogo daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0804n2:462_4: akarā ālaye bahū’’ti pāḷi dissati. ‘‘Mā metaṁ akarā kammaṁ,
anya-e0804n2:462_5: mā me udakamāharī’’ti ettha pana santepi atītavācakapaṭṭhamapurisappayogabhāve māsaddayogato hiyyattanajjatanīvibhattiyo pañcamīvibhattiatthe anuttakālikā hutvā ‘‘tvaṁ mā karosi,
anya-e0804n2:463_0: Kiñca bhiyyo ‘‘jarādhammaṁ mā jīrīti alabbhaneyyaṁ ṭhāna’’ntiādīsupi santepi atītavācakapaṭhamapurisappayogabhāve māsaddayogato ajjatanīvibhattipañcamīvibhattiatthe anuttakālikā hutvā ‘‘mā jīratū’’tiādinā paṭhamapurisappayogārahā bhavanti.
anya-e0804n2:463_1: Tenāhu aṭṭhakathācariyā ‘‘jarādhammaṁ mā jīrīti yaṁ mayhaṁ jarāsabhāvaṁ, taṁ mā jīritu. Esa nayo sesesupī’’ti.
anya-e0804n2:463_4: mayhampetaṁ na ruccatī’’ti imāya pāḷiyā vasena atthitā veditabbā.
anya-e0804n2:463_5: Tassāyamattho ‘‘ācariya bhavaṁ atikkantakaraṇaṁ akarā’’ti paṭhamapurisavasena gahetabbo.
anya-e0804n2:463_6: Apica ‘‘bhava’’nti vattabbe atthe ‘‘tva’’nti vacanaṁ vattabbamevāti adhippāyavasena ‘‘ācariya tvaṁ atikkantakaraṇaṁ karosī’’ti yojanāpi kātabbāva.
anya-e0804n2:464_0: Akaro, akattha, akarotha. Akaraṁ, akaṁ, akaramha, akamha.
anya-e0804n2:464_2: akaṁ puḷinacetiya’’nti pāḷi nidassanaṁ. Akattha, akatthuṁ. Akuruse, akaravhaṁ. Akariṁ, akaraṁ, akaramhase. Hiyyattanīvasena vuttarūpāni.
anya-e0804n2:465_0: Ettha ca pañcavidho sekāro āharitvā dassetabbo.
anya-e0804n2:465_1: Tathā hi pañcavidho sekāro padāvayava apadāvayavaanekantapadāvayava sosaddattha ādesavasena.
anya-e0804n2:465_8: Ettha hi sekāro yadi pañcamīvibhattiyaṁ āmasevacanassāvayavo,
anya-e0804n2:465_10: gaṇhāmase’’ti padānaṁ avayavo hoti. Yadi pana āgamo,
anya-e0804n2:465_15: Eseseti imassa hi ‘‘esoso eko ekaṭṭho’’ti attho.
anya-e0804n2:465_18: Tattha ‘‘akaramhasa te kicca’’nti imassa ‘‘akaramhase te kicca’’nti attho.
anya-e0804n2:466_0: Akari, kari, akāsi, akaruṁ, akariṁsu, akaṁsu, akaṁsuṁ. Akaro, akarittha, akāsittha.
anya-e0804n2:467_0: Ettha ca akaroti tvaṁ akaroti yojetabbaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:467_1: ‘‘Akaro’’ iti hi padaṁ ‘‘varañce me ado sakkā’’ti ettha majjhimapurisekavacanatthaṁ ‘‘ado’’ti padamiva daṭṭhabbaṁ pāḷiyaṁ avijjamānattepi nayavasena gahetabbattā.
anya-e0804n2:467_3: Tādisañhi padaṁ yebhuyyena paṭhamapurisavacanameva hoti. Tathā hi ‘‘adāsi me,
anya-e0804n2:467_4: akāsi me’’ti paṭhamapurisapāḷiyo bahū sandissanti. ‘‘Mākāsi mukhasā pāpaṁ,
anya-e0804n2:467_5: mā kho sūkaramukho ahū’’tiādīsu pana māsaddayogato ‘‘tvaṁ pāpaṁ mā akāsi,
anya-e0804n2:467_6: mā sūkaramukho ahosī’’ti padayojanā kātabbā hotīti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:468_0: Akariṁ , kariṁ, akāsiṁ, akarimha, karimha, akāsimha. Akarā, akarū. Akaruse, akarivhaṁ. Akaraṁ, akarimhe. Ajjatanīvasena vuttarūpāni.
anya-e0804n2:469_0: Karissati, karissanti. Karissasi, karissatha. Karissāmi, karissāma. Karissate, karissante. Karissase, karissavhe. Karissaṁ, kassaṁ iccapi.
anya-e0804n2:469_1: Tathā hi pāḷi dissati ‘‘kassaṁ purisakāriya’’nti. Karissamhe. Tathā kāhati, kāhanti. Kāhasi, kāhatha. Kāhāmi, kāhāma. Kāhiti, kāhinti.
anya-e0804n2:471_0: Kayirati, kayiranti. Kayirasi, kayirātha. Kayirāmi, kayirāma. Kayirate. Sesaṁ yojetabbaṁ. Vattamānāvasena vuttarūpāni.
anya-e0804n2:472_0: Kayiratu, kayirantu. Sesaṁ yojetabbaṁ. Pañcamīvasena vuttarūpāni.
anya-e0804n2:473_2: Tattha kumbhimhipi añjalinti chedo. Kayirāsi, kayirātha. Kayirāmi, kayirāma. Kayiretha, kayireraṁ. Kayiretho, kayirāvho. Kayiraṁ, kayirāmhe. Sattamīvasena vuttarūpāni.
anya-e0804n2:474_0: Tattha kayirāti idaṁ ‘‘puññañce puriso kayirā’’ti dassanato paṭhamapurisavasena yojetabbaṁ,
anya-e0804n2:474_1: ‘‘adhammaṁ sārathi kayirā’’ti etthāpi ‘‘sārathi bhavaṁ adhammaṁ kareyyā’’ti paṭhamapurisavasena yojetabbaṁ, na majjhimapurisavasena.
anya-e0804n2:474_2: Atha vā ‘‘kayirāsī’’ti vattabbe sikāralopaṁ katvā ‘‘kayirā’’ti majjhimapurisavacanaṁ vuttanti gahetabbaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:475_0: Ettha pana siyā – yathā ‘‘puttaṁ labhetha varada’’nti pāḷiyaṁ ‘‘labhethā’’ti imassa padassa ‘‘sabbhireva samāsetha,
anya-e0804n2:475_1: sabbhi kubbetha santhava’’ntiādīsu ‘‘samāsethā’’tiādīnaṁ viya paṭhamapurisavasena atthaṁ aggahetvā purisavipallāsaṁ katvā ‘‘labheyya’’nti uttamapurisavasenattho aṭṭhakathācariyehi gahito,
anya-e0804n2:475_2: tathā tumhehipi ‘‘adhammaṁ sārathi kayirā’’ti ettha ‘‘kayirā’’ti padassa purisavipallāsaṁ katvā ‘‘kareyyāsī’’ti majjhimapurisavasenattho vattabbo,
anya-e0804n2:475_4: evaṁ santepi aṭṭhakathācariyehi vohāratthesu paramakosallasamannāgatattā ‘‘tva’’nti vattabbe atthe bhavaṁsaddo pavattati,
anya-e0804n2:475_5: ‘‘bhava’’nti vattabbe atthe tvaṁsaddo pavattatīti cintetvā adhippāyatthavasena ‘‘kareyyāsī’’ti attho vutto, na purisavipallāsavasena.
anya-e0804n2:475_6: Tathā hi ‘‘puttaṁ labhetha varada’’nti imassa aṭṭhakathāyaṁ ‘‘labhethā’’ti ulliṅgitvā ‘‘labheyya’’nti purisavipallāsavasena vivaraṇaṁ kataṁ.
anya-e0804n2:475_7: ‘‘Adhammaṁ sārathi kayirā’’ti imassa pana aṭṭhakathāyaṁ ‘‘kayirā’’ti ulliṅgitvā ‘‘kareyyāsī’’ti vivaraṇaṁ kataṁ,
anya-e0804n2:475_8: tasmā ‘‘adhammaṁ sārathi kayirā’’ti ettha purisavipallāso na cintetabbo.
anya-e0804n2:475_9: Atha vā yathā ‘‘puttaṁ labhetha varada’’nti ettha ca ‘‘kāye rajo na limpethā’’tiādīsu ethavacanaṁ gahitaṁ,
anya-e0804n2:475_10: evaṁ ethavacanaṁ aggahetvā ‘‘labhe athā’’ti padacchedo karaṇīyo.
anya-e0804n2:475_12: Tattha labheti sattamiyā uttamapurisavacanaṁ ‘‘vajjhañcāpi pamocaye’’ti padamiva.
anya-e0804n2:475_14: Ettha ca adhikārantaravasena aparampi varaṁ puttaṁ labheyyanti attho.
anya-e0804n2:475_16: yasmā cetesu dvīsu dujjāno bhagavato adhippāyo,
anya-e0804n2:476_0: Ettha pana kiñcāpi liṅgavipallāso vibhattivipallāso vacanavipallāso kālavipallāso purisavipallāso akkharavipallāsoti chabbidho vipallāso āharitvā dassetabbo,
anya-e0804n2:476_1: tathāpi so upari āvibhavissatīti na dassito.
anya-e0804n2:476_2: Tatra kayirāthāti padaṁ sattamiyā parassapadavasena attanopadavasena ca dvidhā bhijjati,
anya-e0804n2:476_5: dadantā aparāpara’’nti ettha ‘‘kayirāthā’’ti idaṁ sattamiyā parassapadavasena majjhimapurisabahuvacanavasena ca vuttaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:476_7: ‘‘Kayirātha dhīro puññānī’’ti ettha pana ‘‘kayirāthā’’ti idaṁ sattamiyā attanopadavasena paṭhamapurisekavacanavasena ca vuttaṁ. Kareyyāti hi attho.
anya-e0804n2:476_8: Idha parokkhādivasena yirapaccayasahitāni rūpāni yebhuyyena sāsane appasiddhānīti na dassitāni.
anya-e0804n2:477_0: Attano phalaṁ karotīti kāraṇaṁ. Karotīti kattā, evaṁ kārako kārakaṁ vā.
anya-e0804n2:477_1: Ettha hi kārakasaddo yattha kattukārakakammakārakādivācako, tattha pulliṅgopi hoti, yebhuyyena napuṁsakaliṅgopi.
anya-e0804n2:477_2: Yattha pana rajatakārakammakāralohakārādivācako, tattha pulliṅgo eva. Kārāpetīti kārāpako. Karaṁ, kubbaṁ, krubbaṁ, karonto, kubbanto, kubbāno, kurumāno, pakruṁbbamāno . Kārikā, kārāpikā. Karontī, kubbantī. Kārakaṁ kulaṁ. Kārāpakaṁ, karontaṁ, kubbantaṁ, kurumānaṁ. Saṅkhāro, parikkhāro, parikkhato, purakkhato, karaṇaṁ, kriyā.
anya-e0804n2:477_4: Ettha kriyāsaddo kiñcāpi ‘‘aphalā hoti akrubbato’’tiādīsu kakārarakārasaṁyogavantāni padāni dissanti,
anya-e0804n2:477_5: tathāpi klesasaddo viya pāḷiyaṁ na dissati,
anya-e0804n2:477_6: adissamānopi so aṭṭhakathācariyādīhi garūhi gahitattā gahetabbova.
anya-e0804n2:478_0: Kātuṁ, kattuṁ. Kātave, kāretuṁ. Katvā, katvāna, kātuna, karitvā, karitvāna, kacca, adhikacca, kariya, kariyāna, purakkhitvā, kāretvā.
anya-e0804n2:479_0: Tatra kaccāti katvā. Adhikaccāti adhikaṁ katvā.
anya-e0804n2:479_1: Akkharacintakā pana saddasatthanayaṁ nissāya ‘‘adhikicca’’ iti rūpaṁ icchanti,
anya-e0804n2:479_2: mayaṁ panetādisaṁ rūpaṁ pāḷiyā anukūlaṁ na hotīti na icchāma.
anya-e0804n2:479_3: Tathā hi therikāgāthāyaṁ gotamiyā parinibbānavacane ‘‘padakkhiṇaṁ kacca nipacca pāde’’ti pāḷi dissati.
anya-e0804n2:479_5: Kaccāti padassa dassanena adhikaccāti padampi diṭṭhameva hoti,
anya-e0804n2:480_0: Idāni karotissa dhātussa appamattakaṁ atthātisayayogaṁ kathayāma – taṇhaṅkaro. Kāraṇā.
anya-e0804n2:480_1: Pharusāhi vācāhi pakrubbamāno. Sante na kurute piyanti.
anya-e0804n2:481_0: Tatra taṇhaṅkaroti veneyyānaṁ taṇhaṁ lobhaṁ karoti hiṁsatīti taṇhaṅkaro.
anya-e0804n2:481_1: Atha vā rūpakāyadhammakāyasampattiyā attani sakalalokassa taṇhaṁ sinehaṁ karoti janetīti taṇhaṅkaro. Kāraṇāti hiṁsanā. Pakrubbamānoti hiṁsamāno.
anya-e0804n2:481_2: Sante na kurute piyanti sappurise attano piye iṭṭhe kante manāpe na karotīti attho.
anya-e0804n2:481_3: Atha vā piyaṁ piyāyamāno tussamāno modamāno sante na kurute na sevatīti attho.
anya-e0804n2:481_4: Yathā ‘‘rājānaṁ sevatī’’ti etasmiṁ atthe rājānaṁ piyaṁ kuruteti saddasatthavidū mantenti,
anya-e0804n2:482_1: ‘‘parikkhāroti sattahi nagaraparikkhārehi suparikkhittaṁ hotī’’tiādīsu parivāro vuccati. ‘‘Ratho setaparikkhāro,
anya-e0804n2:482_3: ‘‘Ye cime pabbajitena jīvitaparikkhārā samudānetabbā’’tiādīsu sambhāro. Etthetañhi vuccati –
anya-e0804n2:485_0: Jāgara niddakkhaye. Jāgaroti. Jāgaraṁ. Dīghā jāgarato ratti.
anya-e0804n2:486_0: Tanādī ettakā diṭṭhā, dhātavo me yathābalaṁ;
anya-e0804n2:493_0: Iti navaṅge sāṭṭhakathe piṭakattaye byappathagatīsu viññūnaṁ
